title: SEO Specialist
description:
**Join Our Dynamic Team in the Heart of Cebu City!**

Are you ready for a career adventure in a vibrant and innovative environment? Look no further, CAPTAIN BPO, Inc. a cutting-edge company establishing its roots in the heart of Cebu City, is on the lookout for passionate and talented individuals to join our dynamic team.

**Why Captain BPO?** 

**Innovative Environment:** Be part of a team that thrives on innovation and embraces creativity. We believe in pushing boundaries and redefining possibilities.

**Prime Location:** Our office is strategically located in the heart of Cebu City, surrounded by the energy and excitement of one of the most dynamic cities in the Philippines.

**Start-Up Culture:** Embrace the start-up spirit where your ideas matter, and your contributions make a real impact. We are building something exciting, and we want you to be a part of it from the ground up!

**Collaborative Team:** Join a collaborative and diverse team that values open communication, teamwork, and a shared commitment to success.

Captain BPO, a forward-thinking and innovative company, is seeking a results-driven SEO Manager with a passion for AI integration. As an SEO Manager, you will lead the development and implementation of cutting-edge SEO strategies, leveraging the power of AI technologies. Join us in shaping the future of digital marketing and driving organic growth for our online presence.

**Job Responsibilities:** 

* **AI-Enhanced SEO Strategy:**
* Develop and execute SEO strategies that integrate AI technologies to optimize website performance, content relevance, and search engine rankings.
* **Keyword Research and Analysis:**
* Conduct comprehensive keyword research using AI tools to identify high-value opportunities and trends. Analyze competitor strategies and adapt accordingly.
* **Content Optimization:**
* Collaborate with content creators to optimize website content using AI-driven insights. Implement strategies for natural language processing (NLP) and semantic relevance.
* **Technical SEO:**
* Lead technical SEO initiatives, ensuring website architecture, speed, and mobile responsiveness are optimized. Implement AI solutions for crawl efficiency and website indexing.
* **AI-Powered Analytics:**
* Utilize AI analytics tools to gather and interpret data. Generate actionable insights for continuous improvement in SEO performance and user experience.
* **Link Building Strategies:**
* Develop and implement effective link-building strategies, leveraging AI to identify authoritative sources and relevant opportunities.
* **Local SEO Optimization:**
* Optimize local SEO strategies using AI tools to enhance visibility in local search results. Manage online reviews and implement strategies for local engagement.
* **Algorithm Updates and Trends:**
* Stay informed about search engine algorithm updates, AI trends, and industry best practices. Adapt SEO strategies to align with evolving search engine requirements.
* **Reporting and KPIs:**
* Provide regular and insightful reports on SEO performance. Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and benchmarks for tracking success.

**Required Skills**

* **Must already be a seasoned expert in AI prompt engineering.**
* Proven experience as an SEO Specialist with a focus on AI integration.
* In-depth knowledge of SEO best practices, algorithms, and ranking factors.
* Proficiency in using AI tools for SEO analysis and optimization.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.

**Required Qualifications**

* Certification in SEO or related fields.
* Experience with AI-powered content optimization tools.
* Familiarity with natural language processing and machine learning concepts.
* Previous success in driving organic growth through innovative SEO strategies.
* Expertise in **conducting keyword research** to identify valuable target keywords and phrases.

**Basic web development skills**, particularly with WordPress, to optimize website structure and content effectively.

**Familiarity with image editing/creation** to optimize visual content for search engines and enhance user experience.

**Knowledge of social media platforms and best practices** for leveraging them to improve SEO and drive traffic.

**Understanding of basic web programming concepts** to collaborate effectively with developers and implement technical SEO strategies.

**Comprehensive knowledge of various aspects of SEO**, including:  
On-page optimization  
Off-page optimization (link building, content marketing, etc.)  
Technical SEO (site speed, mobile-friendliness, indexing, etc.)  
Knowledge of Google My Business optimization to improve local search visibility and drive targeted traffic.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Php50,000.00 - Php75,000.00 per month

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift

* Proficient in MSFT Office
* Proficient in English
* Excellent communication skills
* Proficient in CRM software (SalesLoft and Salesforce preferred).
* A positive attitude and strong work ethic.


**AMCS GROUP - DIGITAL WAYS TO A CLEANER WORLD**


Do you want to work for a company with Irish roots and a global impact? A leader in environmental services, AMCS is a trailblazing software company that guides and supports other businesses on their journey towards sustainability.

 **AMCS leads the way**


The AMCS team is at the cutting edge of technology. Companies come to AMCS to achieve their sustainability strategies as we help companies to reduce their carbon footprint and work in a more environmentally conscious way. AMCS has created digital ways to a cleaner world.

 **What we do**


AMCS is a global leader for integrated software and vehicle technology for the environmental services industry. AMCS delivers enterprise cloud-based software solutions worldwide supporting over 2,650 customers in 22 countries. AMCS employs over 1000 people across 11 countries, headquartered in Ireland with offices in North America, Europe, Australia and the Philippines

 **Our people**


AMCS offers team members more than just a job, but an opportunity to map out a career with a company that is growing, evolving and setting out new ways of working that are having a positive impact on the world around us. AMCS was established in Ireland and holds onto those local roots and ‘start-up’ mentality with a culture of connection. Connection to our work, our customers, our colleagues and our community that creates a working environment that fosters openness, collaboration and creativity.

**Join us drive a more sustainable future and enjoy these benefits:**

* Health insurance covering up to three dependents
* Employee shuttle service
* On-site food and free flowing coffee
* Allowances
* Comprehensive learning and development platform that provides on-the-job training on key skills with the ability to regularly self-assess and track your progress centrally
* 15 vacation leave and 15 sick leave

title: Customer Development Specialist
description:
**Who We Are Looking For**

* Bachelor's Degree graduate, preferably of a Marketing / Business / Communications - related courses
* At least 2-3 years experience in Sales, trade/Channel Marketing, Consumer Engagement or Marketing that includes on ground Field Sales experience preferably from an FMCG company.
* Good communication skills - Oral and Written (English, Filipino)
* Data Gathering
* Insight and Analysis
* Trade & Channel Development Strategy & Plan Formulation
* Problem Solving
* Project Management and Monitoring with understanding of sales operation and in-trade execution
* Presentation Skills
* Evaluation
* Budget Management
* Adept with MS Office (Word, Excel & PowerPoint)
* Strong leadership skills
* Strong understanding of program / campaign execution of control & compliance
* High sense of ownership, accountability and entrepreneurial skills
* Good understanding of digital tools
* Outspoken/ability to generate and share ideas
* Adaptable, flexible and open to change
* Ability to analyze business situation and propose actionable solutions focusing on consumer acquisition

**What You Will Do**

* STRATEGY & CAMPAIGN / PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT
* Review and understand all relevant information within the assigned territories through data understanding, competitive review, field work and insight in order to identify challenges and opportunities, developing appropriate short-term and long-term strategic action plans for JTI brands within the territories assigned to enable business growth.
* Responsible for initiating and securing complete project approval (OPB) and all operational mandatories to activate planned campaigns/programs (Coordination with M&S stakeholders, Third Party Agencies, GIP, Suppliers, TME encoding, testing and production).
* Ensure campaign clarity amongst front-liners (TSR/TER)
* LEADING IMPLEMENTATION
* Develop campaign/program mechanics, spiel and lead in briefing to field sales in order to guide them in the proper execution of programs across targeted trade partners and outlets consistent with program objectives, timelines, allocations, and all other company protocols with full compliance.
* Manage overall deployment and implementation of Brand-led /Field Marketing-led activities in the assigned territories.
* Key representative of Field Marketing in overseeing all activities in the assigned territories which will cover but not limited to various program tools such as consumer and trade deals, trade incentives, bundling activities (multi-pack or premium), sampling and consumer brand activations.
* Manage and deliver an optimal full year consumer acquisition campaigns / programs calendar in the assigned territories.
* Drive performance management & investment optimization. Drive program resources planning and deployment
* PROGRAM EVALUATION
* Perform regular survey on campaign / program execution to ensure compliance with standards / intended trade impact. Immediately resolve or address any challenges, that includes immediate escalation.
* Review performance vs objectives and not limited to in terms of volume, stores participation, implementation guidelines, competitive response, ease in implementation and effective campaign spend.
* This include oversee, monitor, measure execution success and program post-evaluation.
* TERRITORY LEADERSHIP
* New Opportunity and New Product Launch Support Brand and Field Marketing on New Product Launches in building robust bottom up launch campaigns that include pipeline volumes and distribution partnering M&S stakeholders, drive merchandising requirement and pricing compliance for the assigned territories.
* Develop consumer campaign in driving New Opportunity to enable brand range selling in pre-identified opportunity territory / barangays.
* Route to Consumer Provide cross functional support in understanding and developing an efficient route to consumer to better deliver high impact campaign and brand reach.
* Be the custodian of Territory toolkit buildup
* RESOURCE MANAGEMENT
* Responsible for assigned field marketing budget management and proper to optimal deployment of program tools and materials.
* Establish strict management, control and compliance for program enablers such as
* Territories FM budget
* Free goods requirement and allocation
* Merchandising materials (POSM inclusive) with right quantity requirement
* Premium items with optimal cost and right quantity requirement
* Physical counting of free goods / premiums / POSM (depot and vehicles)

Job Type: Full-time

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Day shift

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* trade marketing: 1 year (Required)

title: Sales and Marketing Manager (FinTech)
description:
The candidate for this position shall excel at creating and closing new opportunities. By using a consultative approach to selling, this person shall use their expertise to identify and qualify leads, eventually converting to sales opportunities with both new and existing clients.

If you have an entrepreneurial mindset and want to make a difference in the market and your career life – we invite you to join us!

* Identify new sales opportunities and develop new prospect leads and account relationships to meet sales goals and objectives

* Work closely with senior sales management and overseas team members in new programs and initiatives

* General knowledge of financial or payment services and technologies is an advantage
* Good network and connections in the merchants, eCommerce, or payment/banking sectors
* Strong B2B consultative drive, able to drive revenue and client growth, and maintain long-lasting client relationship

title: Digital Marketing Specialist (Cebu City - Onsite)
description:
**Senior Marketing Coordinator**

Benchmark 365 is an innovative IT service delivery company with clients globally. Our focus is on helping MSPs quickly scaling their business by providing 24x7 IT services, advice, consulting, project delivery and helpdesk support.

This post will work together with our CEO to develop, implement and manage marketing campaigns promoting the organization’s products and services. The candidate will majorly enhance brand awareness, drive web traffic, and acquire leads/customers.

In addition to this, the senior Marketing Coordinator will be responsible for Benchmark’s branding content strategy that is aligned with our Recruitment Initiatives and Recruitment Target for this fiscal year.

**Core Objectives**

1. Build a strong employer brand image to be the top-of-mind company of our target IT talents as an employer of choice.

2. Review digital marketing strategies to identify areas for improvement.

3. End-to-end social media campaigns – from crafting, content gathering, content creation, content approval and campaign execution to effectively communicate Benchmark365.

4. Aligns employer brand initiatives with the company’s value proposition.

5. Bring and implement existing knowledge of recruitment marketing strategies and marketing communications skills to execute strategic deliverables for your markets.

**Duties and Responsibilities**

* Develop and execute marketing campaigns, including email marketing, social media, advertising, and events.
* Manage and track marketing budgets and ROI.
* Analyze market trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities and threats.
* Collaborate with internal teams, including product, sales, and creative teams, to ensure consistency and effectiveness of marketing campaigns.
* Oversee the production of marketing materials, such as brochures, videos, and presentations, including basic graphic design and development of presentation materials using PowerPoint, Canva or similar platforms.
* Write and edit marketing copy, including basic to intermediate copywriting skills.
* Manage and execute social media strategy and content across various platforms.
* Keep track of data analytics to remain aware of a company’s progress in improving digital marketing.
* Monitor and report on the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, using data and analytics to measure success and make recommendations for improvement.
* Transcribe, edit video podcasts and convert them to video snippets.
* Develop and implement a succession plan that aligns with the organization’s long-term objectives.

**Recruitment (Employer Branding Initiatives)**

* Develop and execute an employer brand strategy to attract and retain top talent.
* Develop and maintain employer brand messaging across various channels, including website, social media, and recruitment marketing campaigns.
* Craft, curate, post and implement effective Employer Brand initiatives through various Social Media campaigns.
* Lead to execute targeted LinkedIn Pipeline Builder, Facebook Lead Generation, and Google Search & Display campaigns for your markets.
* Work with Recruitment Officer in initiating, securing, and maintaining partnerships with educational and professional institutions to promote the company’s Employer Brand and build talent communities including event management and preparation and delivery of career talks for engagement and networking activities.
* Create and manage a Facebook group for our target IT Talents.

**Experience and Skills**

* Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field.
* 5+ years of experience in marketing, with at least 2 years in a leadership role.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Proficiency in marketing software and tools, ideally with HubSpot, or similar CRM platform, Google Analytics, and Adobe Creative Suite.
* Understanding of digital marketing trends and best practices, including social media.
* Experience in developing and executing an employer brand strategy to attract and retain top talent.
* Ability to analyze data and make data-driven decisions.
* Basic to intermediate experience with graphic design, presentation development using PowerPoint, Canva, or similar platforms, and copywriting skills.
* Strong attention to detail and commitment to quality.

Note: Apply only when you are from Cebu and willing to travel on our onsite office daily. Office is located at Philamlife Building, near Ayala.

Job Type: Contract  
Contract length: 12 months

Pay: Php30,000.00 - Php35,000.00 per month

* 8 hour shift

title: Junior Sales & Marketing Associate
description:
Join Our Team as a Junior Sales & Marketing Associate!

Are you passionate about sales and marketing? Do you thrive in dynamic environments where creativity meets strategy? BE Residences - Living Ideas is seeking a Junior Sales & Marketing Associate to join our innovative team!

**Responsibilities Include:**

**Sales:**

* Collaborate closely with the Marketing Officer to devise effective sales and marketing strategies, ensuring alignment with company goals.
* Contribute to the development of compelling marketing campaigns, including email and other mediums, to drive sales.
* Monitor campaign performance and prepare comprehensive sales reports for management review.
* Work hand-in-hand with the Marketing Officer to execute marketing and communications plans, encompassing both above-the-line (print, TV, radio) and below-the-line (collateral, brochures) activities.

**Digital Sales:**

* Assist in gathering and analyzing consumer behavior data to enhance digital marketing efforts.
* Support the management of social media platforms, staying abreast of trends and technologies impacting the industry.

**Brand Activations:**

* Play a key role in product communication across various platforms, generating excitement around new offerings.
* Handle feedback channels and ensure timely issue resolution.
* Collaborate with the Marketing Officer on product research and development initiatives.

**Organization and Management:**

* Aid in maintaining and updating inventory, sales, and customer databases.
* Uphold confidentiality regarding internal information and trade secrets.
* Adhere strictly to company standard operating procedures.
* Undertake ad-hoc administrative tasks as required.

**What We're Looking For:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field.
* Strong analytical skills with a keen eye for detail.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.
* Familiarity with digital marketing tools and platforms preferred.
* Enthusiasm for staying updated on industry trends and technologies.

**Why Join Us:**  
At BE Residences - Living Ideas, we foster a collaborative and inclusive environment where creativity and innovation thrive. As a member of our team, you'll have the opportunity to contribute meaningfully to exciting projects while continuously developing your skills.

If you're ready to embark on a rewarding career journey with us, apply now to become our newest Junior Sales & Marketing Associate! Send your resume and cover letter outlining your qualifications and interest in the position to this Indeed job posting.

Join us in shaping the future of BE Residences - Living Ideas!

company: Maayo Group (The Hospital at Maayo & San Lucas Medical)
description:

**Education:**

**Knowledge:**

**Experience:**

**Other Skills:** 

* Excellent communication skills
* Excellent negotiation skills
* Excellent leadership and people management skills
* Excellent critical thinking and problem solving ability
* Highly flexible and innovative that can work under
* pressure and deadlines

**Job Description:**

**A. Lead Generation, Account Management and Sales Production**

* Prospects and acquires business for the facility, meets or exceeds budget targets and achieve ARR, census targets and revenue goals
* Generate leads handles inquiries, and establishes contact with clients, evaluate client needs and requirement, promote and proactively sell the facility’s services and packages
* Prepares proposals and contracts according to the rate structure, negotiate packages and inclusions, arrange site inspections, executes suitable approach to facilitate closing of sales deals
* Identify new markets and develop new business to increase sales
* Observe rate trends and recommend sales strategies to improve revenue, work closely with business development in generating activity for newly identified markets.
* Review Sales accounts regularly based on its production and amount of business generated, maintains professional relationship with bookers - travel agents and corporate accounts and its decision makers.
* Continuously conducts market research on latest and upcoming trends and gathers marketing intelligence on competitors to pass on to the Director of Sales so that he/she is kept well informed on market developments.
* Provide the highest quality of service
* Strictly follows 24 hours’ response time to all inquiries and business leads.

**B. Promotion**

* Represent the facility in various external activities such as travel and trade shows, exhibits, and conventions.
* Proactively support the facility’s promotion in its digital platforms - Facebook, Instagram and Viber.
* Conducts sales trip to source and develop new market, establish relationship with key clients and accounts.
* Participates in networking and social activities, clubs and organizations relevant to the facility’s interest Assist in developing tools to measure sales and marketing promotion, records results and suggests measures for improvements.
* Organize promotional activities - site tours and previews - to upsell and cross sell other revenue generating areas of the facility.

**C. Resource Allocation and Control**

* Practices cost-effective measures and processes in day to day operations including but not limited to office resources, representation allowances, entertainment expenses and etc.
* Liaise with other personnel to ensure the smooth operation of the department and ensures that every staff member carries out their duties accordingly.

**D. Coordination**

* Coordinates functions and groups that relate to active accounts and possible sales and lead generation.
* Accompany sales team on sales call to assist in development of new accounts and to evaluate skills and effective of the sales person.
* Daily communication with relevant departments to ensure that guests and patients are receiving the highest level of service possible.

**E. Administration**

* Attends meetings and events as required / directed by the Director of Sales.
* Supports familiarization and/or site inspection trips to the property.
* Establishes and maintains files on major active accounts within his/her market area
* Submits required reports, weekly, monthly and quarterly.

title: Digital Content Manager
description:
**We are:**


Wisevu (pronounced Wiseview) is a well-established and highly experienced remote digital marketing agency, founded in 2008, with headquarters in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, and Split Croatia.


We are a team of highly skilled and passionate remote web developers, web designers, SEO engineers and digital marketing experts helping essential businesses through industry-leading digital marketing solutions.

**We are looking for:**


We're looking for a highly organized and detail-oriented Digital Content Manager to join our dynamic digital marketing agency. You'll be responsible for overseeing the entire production process of your assigned clients/pod, from project initiation to execution and delivery, including managing website development and SEO projects. This involves working closely with cross-functional teams (development, content, design) to ensure successful project execution.

**Requirements**

* **Team Leadership:** A core part of your job will be to lead, manage, and hold the production team Accountable. You'll be a leader, providing guidance and support to a team of talented SEO specialists, paid ads specialists, copywriters, designers, developers, and social media specialists. You'll supervise, mentor, and foster a collaborative environment and ensure everyone is working towards shared goals.

* **Project Management:** You'll wear the project manager hat, ensuring all digital marketing projects are completed on time, within budget, and to Wisevu standards. This involves developing project plans, tracking new and ongoing projects, managing resources/teams, and ensuring quality, on-time delivery, and client satisfaction.

* **Process Optimization:** You'll be tasked with identifying areas for improvement in the production process, identifying bottlenecks, eliminating wasteful activities, streamlining workflows, and implementing strategies to increase efficiency and reduce errors.

* **Reporting & Analytics:** Generating insightful reports and presentations that track project performance, identify trends, and measure the success of our digital marketing efforts, including website traffic and SEO rankings.

**Qualifications:**

* 2-5 years of experience in project management, ideally within a marketing or advertising agency.
* Proven track record of successfully managing and leading a team.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, comfortable interacting with all levels of the organization.
* High follow-through, organized, and detail-oriented, with a strong ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
* Tech savvy and able to quickly learn new software tools.
* Proficient in using leading digital marketing platforms/software.
* Proficient in project management tools.
* Proactive, with a strong initiative and a willingness to learn new technologies and methodologies.

**Highly Desired:**

* Certification in Project Management like Scrum Master/ PMP.
* Experience in custom plugin development project management.
* Coding experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, or other web dev languages.
* Experience with digital marketing best practices in SEO, PPC, Social Media Marketing, conversion rate optimization, and web development).
* Understanding of content management systems (CMS) and marketing automation platforms.

**Skills:**

* Excellent verbal communication and client management skills.
* Strong leadership and team management skills.
* Great attention to detail and ability to multitask.
* Self-motivated and self-sufficient.

**Work-timings**

* Able to provide at least 5 hours of overlap with the 9 am-5 pm EST workday (Monday - Friday).
* Weekends are also optional for additional income.

**Benefits**

* **Compensation:** Competitive starting salary between $2500-$3500 CAD which will be negotiated during the interview based on competencies, skills, and experience.
* **Working remotely:** Work from the comfort of your own home office or workspace
* **Flexible working schedule**
* **Employee Development Courses:** Fun and highly educational career opportunity. Paid premium-quality Employee Development Courses. As well as one-on-one training from highly experienced digital marketers with over 15 years of experience.
* **Quality Equipment:** Free Computer & Cell Phone.
* **Quarterly performance bonuses.**
* **Many other benefits** which will be discussed during the interview.

If you possess the skills and experience necessary to excel in this role and are excited about the opportunity to lead digital marketing projects at Wisevu Inc, we look forward to meeting you and hopefully working together for many great years to come.


Please Apply Here: https://apply.workable.com/wisevu/j/65AD53BB52/apply/


Note: We currently have multiple openings available.


*Open to remote applicants from the Philippines.*


Wisevu Inc.

*2024 © All the content in this job ad is the sole private property of Wisevu Inc. and shall not be used without written consent from Wisevu Inc. The content therein is protected by the Copyright Act of Canada and the Copyright Act of United States of America. All Rights Reserved. For Wisevu Inc Use Only: #LI-REMOTE #philippines*

title: Account Manager Cebu
description:
ABOUT US
  
  

Norde International Distributors is Making Digital Happen.
  
  

Located in Quezon City, Philippines, the company was established in 2005 and has become the leading distributor of digital graphic solutions in the country. Throughout its more than a decade history, Norde has been associated with continuous innovation and revolutionary technology.
  
  

The company collaborates with global partners who possess cutting edge machineries, highly developed skills and certified processes that strengthens business.
  
  

Norde International provides exceptional state-of the-art digital print solutions to a broad array of industry segments covering general commercial printing, labels, packaging, signages, displays, finishing, direct to garment, design, manufacturing, engineering, and 3D technology.
  
  

The company aims to bring forth progress and innovation to its clients. It targets to bring great opportunities that can provide sustainability and progress.
  
  

Norde International Distributors continuously go beyond expectation as it make digital possibilities happen
  
  

MISSION
  
We empower our customers to be the most successful they can be in their respective industries by improving their product development and production processes. We do this by:
  
  

+ Delivering great service through our people and processes
  
+ Offering relevant solutions through our technologies and innovation
  
+ Creating and nurturing mutually beneficial partnerships through commitment and integrity

To be the overwhelming partner-of-choice in our target segments through our market leadership, world class products, and industry-leading after-sales services.
  
  

ONE NORDE. ONE TEAM.

title: Business Development Coordinator | Work From Home
description:
ClinicMind, the nation’s leader in multi-specialty Electronic Healthcare Records (EHR) software and Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) services, is looking for a full-time Business Development Coordinator. If you’re excited to be part of a winning team, ClinicMind is a perfect place to get ahead.



The Business Development Coordinator is a role within the Professional Services Division at ClinicMind that is dedicated to a specific brand. Working closely with the VP of Business Development, this position is instrumental in executing strategies, creating a market presence and managing affiliate relationships. The role involves coordinating event logistics, managing events registrations, and oversees travel and accommodation arrangements for staff. Collaborates with Marketing on social media campaigns and liaises with Paid Affiliates and Sponsored Speakers to maximize event impact. Also responsible for managing Genesis Success Partners agreements, tracking KPIs, and ensuring timely payments and reporting.


**Duties and Responsibilities**
-------------------------------



* Event Target Support: Assist the VP of Business Development in investigating external events and targeting the best opportunities to increase market presence and attain new relationships.


* Affiliate Liaison: Act as the primary point of contact for business administrative tasks related to affiliates and sponsored speakers. This includes and is not limited to providing agreements for execution, details for events, confirming payments to affiliates and sponsored speakers.


* Event Management: Oversee and coordinate the execution of live events. This includes registration, procuring electric/wifi, coordinating with ClinicMind event staff to confirm travel, hotel and booth arrangements.


* Marketing Team Collaboration: Work closely with the VP of Business Development and the Marketing Team to create and launch collaborative marketing initiatives between ClinicMind and affiliates. Also, collaborate with the marketing team to keep social media of events up to date.


* Performance Monitoring: Work closely with the VP of Business Development to track and analyze the performance of business development initiatives.


* Market Research: Conduct market research to stay informed about industry trends and competitor strategies, using insights to enhance business development efforts.

  


**Qualifications**
------------------



* Preferably in Business Administration, Marketing, Communications, or a related field.


* 1-3 years of experience in a business administration role, with a focus on client relationship management.


* Familiarity with digital platforms such as Hubspot, Salesforce, Google Documents, Google Sheets and other relationship management tools.


* Experience working business administration including external client facing communications.


* Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and work under tight deadlines.

  


**Skills and Abilities**
------------------------



* Strong Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively liaise with various stakeholders and external agencies.


* Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze documents, data and derive actionable insights.


* Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and time-management skills, with a keen attention to detail.


* Creative Thinking: Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas for collaborative marketing initiatives.


* Team Collaboration: Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and with cross-functional teams.


* Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to change.


* Technical Proficiency: Proficiency with CRM systems (like Salesforce), project management tools (like Monday), and Google Documents and Sheets.
  




**Position Requirements:**


* Must have a stable internet connection minimum of 25 MBPS
* Must have a mobile data plan as a backup
* Must be in a quiet environment
* Must be comfortable working the US business hours
* Must own a PC with at least 8 GB of memory

* Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or related field 3 years of hands-on marketing experience in the healthcare or technology industries Experience with digital marketing tools and platforms, such as Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, and email marketing software such as HubSppot.

We Offer:

title: Customer Success Supervisor
description:
**Company Description**  

At QIMA, we are on a mission to offer our clients smart solutions to make products you can trust.


Operating in over 100 countries, we service the consumer products, food, and life sciences industries, and intelligence for quality and compliance data.


What sets us apart is our unique culture. Our 5,000 Qimers live and make decisions every day by our QIMA Values, which client passion, integrity, and a commitment to making things simple, we disrupted the Testing, Inspection, and Certification industry. Are you ready to hop on this exciting ride with us and help us achieve our mission?

 **Job Description**  

Your primary responsibility is to support the fast-growing Customer Success Management (CSM) team by reliably maintaining and improving business reports and processes.


Our goal is to meet and exceed clients’ expectations by acting as trusted advisors supporting their digital transformation.


Key Responsibilities include:

**Standardization, Processes, Training:**

* Contribute to Internal projects of formalization and standardization
* Create models to answer current business questions; validate and understand the conclusions
* Create presentations for Customer meetings
* Create quotation files and follow the invoicing process
* Assist in identifying improvements to our Internal Customer Success operations systems to improve processes
* Support to train other teams: Business Development Managers, Front-end and Customer Service.

**Analysis & Strategy:**

* Submit reports on Customer Success activities and results
* Maintenance of CSM business unit reporting tools, dashboards and reports
* Assist the Customer Success Strategist in building engagement strategies that will enhance the User Experience on our interfaces
* Assist the Customer Success Manager in building value narrative for our customers, based on data analytics and conversation insights

**Client facing:**

* Act as point of contact for vendors and customers in Asia
* Participate in client calls and client facing communications

**Development, Improvement and Expansion:**

* Be a customer advocate to ensure customer feedback is communicated to product and engineering team
* Be a champion of our software
* Work with Marketing team on promoting our software

  

**Qualifications**  

It could be you, if you have:

* Excellent communication skills in English: both written and verbal
* Great Excel and Powerpoint skills: analytics & data visualization, including the ability to communicate quantitative data into a visually engaging story and to organize/integrate large amounts of information into concise presentation
* Detail-oriented
* Creativity: you will bring to the table new ideas and concepts
* Resourceful and solution-oriented: you are autonomous in finding solutions to problems
* Engagement: you have lots of energy, you want to learn, and you are committed to succeeding while having an impact
* Good understanding of our Testing, Inspection and Certification (TIC) business

  

**Additional Information**  

PERKS YOU CAN GET BY JOINING QIMA PHILIPPINES

* HMO (Medical insurance) 100% for Employee and 100% for first dependent
* 15 days paid leave
* Team-building activities
* Free coffee
* Game room
* Performance-based salary adjustments
* Employee recognition awards
* Social Awareness and Community
* Involvement Activities

title: Business Development Manager (German Speaker)
description:
**Company Description**  

At **QIMA**, we are on a mission to offer our clients smart solutions to make products you can trust.


Operating in over 100+ countries, we serve the **consumer products, food & life sciences** industries and help more than 30,000 brands, retailers, manufacturers, and growers achieve quality excellence.


We combine on-the-ground expertise with digital solutions that bring accuracy, transparency and intelligence for quality and compliance data.


What sets us apart is our unique culture. Our 5,000 Qimers live and make decisions every day by our QIMA Values. With client passion, integrity and a commitment to making things simple, we disrupted the Testing, Inspection, and Certification industry. Are you ready to hop on this exciting ride with us and help us achieve our mission?

 **Job Description**  

As a Business Development Manager at QIMA, your primary responsibilities will include:

* **Client Portfolio Management:** Develop and manage your own client portfolio, typically consisting of companies involved in the import and export of consumer goods globally.
* **Prospect Acquisition:** Utilize various methods such as cold calling, networking, referrals, and participating in fairs and exhibitions to identify and acquire new clients, mainly focusing on Hong Kong & other Far East countries sourcing offices & overseas clients.
* **Client Relationship:** Nurture prospective clients, maintain consistent and open communication, and successfully close deals.
* **Upselling Services:** Promote additional services to existing clients to ensure they leverage the solutions provided by QIMA optimally.
* **Collaboration:** Work in synergy with the Operations and Marketing Teams to drive large-scale projects and increase market awareness.
* **Market Analysis:** Analyze market trends, establish competitive advantages, and monitor metrics to ensure effective use of analytics in achieving ambitious sales targets.

  

**Qualifications** **WHAT IS THE IDEAL CANDIDATE PROFILE?**

* Proficiency in B2B sales with a minimum experience of 3 years.
* A solid command over the English language. An additional language would be a distinct advantage.
* Exceptional communication skills with a knack for building diverse stakeholder relationships.
* A background in product testing, inspection, and audit industry, as well as an understanding of global trade issues, would be highly beneficial.
* Self-motivated individual with the ability to manage schedules autonomously and to effectively delegate and guide internal teams.
* Proven track record in sales, with a talent for identifying and developing new business opportunities as well as managing a client portfolio.
* Remarkable negotiation skills, with an ability to effectively interact in various cultural scenarios.

**WHAT ARE YOUR SOFT SKILLS?**


We are ardently in search of a Business Development Manager who displays an insatiable desire for discovering new business opportunities and driving expansion, complemented by a passion-filled, energetic, and positively invigorating attitude.


The ideal candidate would embody an inherent sense of initiative and self-motivation, show an independent and innovative approach towards problem-solving, and possess the capability to adeptly manage and steer projects to reach their fullest potential. Ultimately, these key qualities will prove pivotal in our selection process. We welcome those ready and excited to make a significant impact.

**WHAT WILL YOU GAIN FROM THE EXPERIENCE?**

* **Sales Expertise:** You will gain valuable, hands-on B2B sales experience in a global market.
* **Cultural Insight:** Working across different cultures, you'll develop an understanding of international business etiquette and norms.
* **Industry Knowledge:** You will gain insights into the product testing, inspection, and audit industry as well as global trade issues.
* **Leadership Skills:** As you'll manage your own schedule and guide internal teams, you'll refine your leadership and management skills.
* **Networking:** Given the role's nature, you will have the opportunity to network extensively, building useful connections.
* **Professional Growth:** At QIMA, your sales and negotiation skills will be honed, contributing significantly to your career growth.
* **Rewarding Experience:** Your contributions as a Business Development Manager will directly impact QIMA, making the experience fulfilling and rewarding.


Additional information

**SO, ARE YOU READY TO BECOME A QIMer? JOIN US!**


Because our differences make the difference, at QIMA we are proud to promote inclusive diversity and equal opportunities! Our policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.

*QIMA recognizes and recruits all of its talents.*

title: Quality Assurance Reviewer
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**  



As a Card Marketing Copy QA Analyst you will contribute to a strong controls environment as an integral part of the first line of defense (FLOD) by executing Quality Assurance testing for the purposes of assessing partner adherence to targeted processes, guidelines, and/or regulatory requirements.




Welcome to JPMorgan Chase. As a Card Marketing Copy QA Analyst you will perform Quality Assurance testing on for the purposes of assessing partner adherence to targeted processes, guidelines, and/or regulatory requirements.

**Required qualifications, capabilities, and skills**

* 3 + years of professional experience performing analytically focused tasks involving Quality Reviews (QA / QC), Business Controls, Regulatory Compliance, Risk, Audit, or similar
* Bachelor’s degree and/or CRCM (Certified Regulatory Compliance Manager) preferred
* Demonstrated analytical and critical thinking capabilities with sharp attention to detail
* Proven history of successful organization and time management skills, effectively prioritizing work & organizing materials to meet deadlines




**Preferred qualifications, capabilities and skills**

* Communicate effectively across multiple levels of the business (verbal and written)
* Be collaborative and build strong relationships across the organization
* Capable of discussing differing opinions while maintaining composure and professionalism
* Regulatory compliance knowledge of consumer-focused regulations related to marketing and digital media channels is a plus
* Strong working knowledge of advertising/marketing practices across various marketing channels is a plus




**ABOUT US**  

JPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.  

  

We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as mental health or physical disability needs. Visit our FAQs for more information about requesting an accommodation.

  

  

  

**ABOUT THE TEAM**  

  

Our Consumer & Community Banking division serves our Chase customers through a range of financial services, including personal banking, credit cards, mortgages, auto financing, investment advice, small business loans and payment processing. We’re proud to lead the U.S. in credit card sales and deposit growth and have the most-used digital solutions – all while ranking first in customer satisfaction.

title: Digital PR Specialist - Remote from home
description:
We are seeking an experienced and creative Digital PR Specialist to join our growing marketing team. In this role, you will be responsible for ideating, executing, and promoting compelling digital PR campaigns that earn high-quality backlinks, brand mentions, and media coverage for our company and clients.


Key Responsibilities:

* Brainstorm newsworthy campaign ideas by researching trending topics, analyzing target publications, and identifying unique data and expert commentary opportunities
* Develop digital PR strategies encompassing reactive PR, data-driven campaigns, and expert commentary/thought leadership
* Create engaging content such as data reports, infographics, surveys, and press releases that resonate with target audiences and journalists
* Conduct media outreach to build relationships with journalists, secure press coverage, and earn authoritative backlinks
* Collaborate with internal teams such as SEO, content, and account management to align PR efforts with overall marketing goals
* Track, analyze and report on digital PR campaign performance metrics including links earned, reach, share of voice, and referral traffic

**Requirements**

* 3+ years of experience in digital PR, link building, and/or media relations roles
* Proven track record of ideating and executing creative, data-driven PR campaigns that earn links and coverage
* Strong news sense and understanding of what makes a story newsworthy and relevant to journalists
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft compelling pitches and press materials
* Proficiency with PR tools such as Cision, Roxhill, Prowly, Muck Rack for media research and outreach
* Solid understanding of SEO fundamentals and how PR supports link acquisition efforts
* Ability to build relationships with journalists and adapt communication style across industries and personalities
* Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and jumping on reactive PR opportunities as stories break
* Experience with data analysis and visualization is a plus
* BA/BS degree in PR, marketing, journalism or related field preferred

If you are a quick-thinking, data-savvy PR professional with a knack for turning ideas into link-worthy news stories, we'd love to hear from you. This role offers competitive compensation, benefits, and the opportunity to make a real impact at an innovative company. To apply, please send your resume, portfolio, and 2-3 digital PR campaign examples

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
**Job Summary:**We are seeking a skilled Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to drive online traffic to our website, increase brand awareness, and generate leads and conversions. The Digital Marketing Specialist will utilize various digital platforms such as social media, email, search engines, and display advertising to achieve these objectives.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns to drive online traffic, increase brand awareness, and generate leads and conversions.
* Manage and optimize digital advertising campaigns across various platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads, etc.
* Conduct keyword research and analysis for search engine optimization (SEO) to improve website visibility and rankings on search engine results pages (SERPs).
* Create and manage engaging content for social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.) to foster audience engagement and grow social media following.
* Monitor and analyze website traffic and performance metrics using Google Analytics and other analytics tools to identify opportunities for optimization and improvement.
* Develop and manage email marketing campaigns, including content creation, list segmentation, and performance tracking.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams (e.g., marketing, design, content) to develop integrated marketing strategies and ensure consistency across all digital channels.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing, including new tools and technologies, and recommend innovative strategies to achieve marketing objectives.
* Prepare and present regular reports on digital marketing performance and ROI to stakeholders, highlighting key metrics, insights, and recommendations for improvement.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
* Proven experience (2 years) working in digital marketing roles, with a strong track record of executing successful campaigns.
* In-depth knowledge of digital marketing channels and platforms, including but not limited to Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn Ads, Google Analytics, SEO tools, etc.
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create compelling content for digital channels.
* Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a strong attention to detail.
* Ability to multitask and manage multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment.
* Experience working with marketing automation tools (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo) is a plus.
* Relevant certifications (e.g., Google Ads, Google Analytics) are desirable but not required.

Our client is a leading health and wellness clinic that focuses on holistic and comprehensive approaches to health. With a commitment to providing exceptional care and support to their clients, they offer a range of services designed to address both physical and mental well-being. Their innovative approach combines traditional medical practices with alternative therapies to achieve optimal health outcomes.

The clinic is in search of a **Digital Marketing Specialist** to enhance the clinic's digital presence across a variety of platforms including their clinical services, digital products, and online learning initiatives. The ideal candidate will have expertise in social media management, graphic design, copywriting, and website design, and will be responsible for creating compelling content, managing the content calendar, and designing various sales and marketing materials. Initially focusing on the clinic's foundational services, the role will progressively support its expanding suite of digital and educational products, including Training and Memberships. Proficiency in Squarespace and email marketing will be considered a significant advantage.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement a comprehensive digital marketing strategy that supports the clinic’s full range of services—including clinical operations, digital products, and online learning platforms—to enhance online presence and engagement.
* Design, update, and maintain the clinic's website, ensuring it is user-friendly, up-to-date, and effectively reflects the brand’s holistic health approach and its diverse service offerings.
* Create compelling sales and marketing materials that communicate the value propositions of the clinic’s various services, with an initial focus on foundational clinic services and a planned expansion to include digital and educational products.
* Write and edit copy for a variety of formats such as blogs, promotional materials, and digital content across all business areas, ensuring consistency with the clinic’s messaging and tone.
* Manage and optimize the clinic’s website via Squarespace, including regular content updates and enhancements, with an emphasis on integrating and optimizing email marketing strategies to improve engagement and outreach.
* Work collaboratively with the marketing team to develop marketing strategies that progressively support the clinic’s expanding services, starting with the foundational clinic operations and extending to include Training and Memberships by the end of the year.
* Integrate AI applications, particularly ChatGPT, into marketing workflows under the guidance of the Director of Operations, ensuring safe and ethical use as the technology evolves.

**Skills and Competencies:**

* Proven experience in digital marketing, evidenced by a robust portfolio showcasing expertise in social media management, graphic design, copywriting, and content management.
* Proficiency in graphic design software and tools, capable of producing high-quality visual content that resonates with a diverse audience across various digital platforms.
* Exceptional writing and editing skills, adept at creating engaging and informative content tailored to multiple facets of a health and wellness business, including clinical services, digital products, and online education.
* Strong experience with Squarespace for website development and content management.
* Advanced knowledge in integrating and optimizing email marketing within Squarespace to enhance digital engagement and customer outreach.
* Creative and strategic thinker with a demonstrated ability to develop and implement innovative marketing strategies that effectively bridge brick-and-mortar operations with online and digital services, supporting overall business objectives.
* Excellent organizational skills, with the capability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely completion and adherence to deadlines.
* Experience or familiarity with the health and wellness industry, while not mandatory, is considered advantageous, as it provides a deeper understanding of the market dynamics and client needs.
* Demonstrated interest and skills in integrating and adapting AI technology within digital marketing strategies, following industry standards for ethical usage.

**Additional Information:**

* Start Date: ASAP
* Employment Type: Part-time, 20 hours per week to start
* Work Schedule: To be agreed upon
* Rate: $9 - $11 CAD per hour (Canadian Dollars)
* Work Arrangement: Remote/work-from-home. Must have a complete home equipment setup (desktop/laptop, headset, stable internet, webcam).

Job Types: Part-time, Fixed term  
Contract length: 12 months

Pay: Php8,500.00 - Php9,200.00 per week

Expected hours: No less than 20 per week

Benefits:

* Work from home

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday
* Night shift

Supplemental pay types:

* Overtime pay

Application Question(s):

* Please share a link to your portfolio here.
* What graphic design tools are you comfortable or proficient in using?
* Have you worked with Squarespace before?

Expected Start Date: 05/09/2024

title: Web Developer (WordPress)
description:
**Are you passionate about web development and excited about the possibilities of AI in creating cutting-edge websites? Captain BPO, a leader in digital marketing, is seeking a creative and technically skilled Web Developer with experience in AI-driven design tools to join our team. Help us push the boundaries of what's possible in web development!**

**Summary:** 

We are seeking a talented and experienced Web Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, coding, and modifying websites and web applications, from layout to function and according to a client's specifications. They will strive to create visually appealing sites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation. The Web Developer will also be responsible for troubleshooting and debugging web applications to ensure optimal performance and reliability. The successful candidate will possess excellent problem-solving skills and a strong understanding of web development technologies and best practices. They will collaborate closely with designers, project managers, and other team members to deliver high-quality solutions on time and within budget.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Website Development**: Designing and creating websites using programming languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
* **Frontend Development**: Implementing the user interface and user experience (UI/UX) design provided by designers using frontend technologies like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* **Backend Development**: Building the server-side of web applications, handling databases, and ensuring the website's functionality and performance. Common backend technologies include Node.js, Python (with frameworks like Django or Flask), Ruby on Rails, etc.
* **Database Management**: Designing, implementing, and maintaining databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) to store and retrieve data for web applications.
* **Version Control**: Using version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage codebase changes, collaborate with other developers, and ensure code quality and integrity.
* **Testing and Debugging**: Writing and executing test cases to ensure the reliability, security, and performance of web applications. Debugging and troubleshooting issues as they arise.
* **Responsive Design**: Ensuring websites are optimized for various devices and screen sizes through responsive design techniques.
* **Security**: Implementing security measures to protect web applications from common threats such as SQL injection, cross-site scripting (XSS), and cross-site request forgery (CSRF).
* **Optimization**: Optimizing website performance, including page load times, to enhance user experience and search engine rankings.
* **Collaboration and Communication**: Working closely with designers, stakeholders, and other team members to understand project requirements, provide technical input, and ensure timely delivery of projects.
* **Continuous Learning**: Staying updated with the latest web development trends, tools, and technologies to improve skills and efficiency.
* **Documentation**: Documenting code, processes, and project requirements for future reference and team collaboration.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent work experience).
* Proven experience as a web developer, with a strong portfolio showcasing web development projects and proficiency in front-end and back-end technologies.
* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and front-end frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
* Experience with server-side programming languages and frameworks (e.g., Node.js, Python, PHP, Java).
* Knowledge of web development tools and technologies, such as Git, npm, webpack, and RESTful APIs.
* Familiarity with web design principles, UI/UX best practices, and responsive design techniques.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail, with the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex web applications.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment and interact with clients and stakeholders.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Php30,000.00 - Php45,000.00 per month

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Evening shift

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* Web Development: 2 years (Preferred)

title: Technical SEO Specialist
description:
**Job Overview:**

MyPortal™ Marketing, Inc., on behalf of one of our esteemed clients, is currently seeking a Technical SEO Specialist. MyPortal serves as a trusted partner in sourcing top-tier talent to meet our client's digital marketing needs.

As a Technical SEO Specialist, you will play a crucial role in optimizing website content and improving search engine visibility to enhance our client's online presence. Reporting directly to the SEO Manager, you will be instrumental in implementing SEO best practices, conducting keyword research, and analyzing website performance metrics to drive organic traffic and improve user engagement.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Comprehensive Website Reviews:** Conduct detailed evaluations of websites to identify areas for improvement in terms of technical SEO, including issues with how search engines access and understand the site.
* **Keyword Collaboration:** Work closely with content teams to develop keyword strategies that align with the business goals and target audience, ensuring the content is optimized for search engine visibility.
* **Enhanced Page Elements:** Optimize various elements of web pages such as titles, headings, images, and links to improve their visibility and relevance in search engine results.
* **Speed and Accessibility Enhancements:** Evaluate and enhance website speed and accessibility, ensuring that users, especially those on mobile devices, can easily access and navigate the site.
* **Mobile Optimization:** Ensure that websites are user-friendly and visually appealing on mobile devices, considering factors like responsive design and mobile-specific user experience.
* **Structured Data Implementation:** Implement structured data markup to help search engines understand the content on the website better, potentially leading to enhanced search result features like rich snippets.
* **Problem-Solving Technical Issues:** Identify and address technical challenges that might hinder the website's performance in search engines, such as broken links or duplicate content.
* **Sitemap Management:** Create and maintain sitemaps that help search engines navigate and index website content effectively.
* **Robots.txt Optimization:** Optimize the robots.txt file to guide search engine crawlers on which areas of the site to prioritize, ensuring efficient crawling and indexing.
* **Monitoring and Reporting:** Utilize tools like Google Analytics and Google Search Console to monitor website performance metrics, track keyword rankings, and provide regular reports to stakeholders.
* **Continuous Learning:** Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends and algorithm changes, continuously refining strategies to ensure the website remains optimized for search engines

**Requirements:**

* Proven experience in on-page SEO optimization and website content optimization.
* In-depth knowledge of SEO tools such as SEMrush, Moz, Ahrefs, Google Search Console, and Google Analytics.
* Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as they relate to on-page SEO elements and technical optimization.
* Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.
* Creative mindset with the ability to develop compelling and engaging content optimized for search engines and users.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, Computer Science, or related field (preferred).
* Google Analytics and SEO certifications (preferred).

If you are passionate about on-page SEO optimization and possess the skills and experience required for this role, we encourage you to apply and join our dedicated marketing team!

title: Area Planning Supervisor - Mandaue Mandaue City, Cebu, Philippines Commercial
description:
Be a part of a revolutionary change
  

  

At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business and building our future on one clear purpose – to deliver a smoke-free future.  

  

Sales and Marketing at PMI feels like building a new business – but with the accumulated expertise of a global brand behind you. Bring us your curiosity and capacity to engage people and you can be part of the digital, omni-channel team that’s driving our huge commercial transformation.
  

  

Accountabilities: Your day to day tasks  

PMFTC is seeking talented people to join our Commercial Planning group as Area Planning Supervisor:  

  

You will support the team in making insightful analysis and recommendations based on all available data, including Sales volumes and other internal KSIs, Nielsen, CAST, field surveys and other researches. You will prepare reports and insights for the region with close coordination with Area Planning Analysts. You will also be responsible for the maintenance and monitoring of the customer database of the territory, including route plan maintenance.
  

  

Your responsibilities include:
  

* Volume Planning - Data Generation and Analysis

Support Commercial Development Supervisor in providing relevant data and analysis covering sales volume achievement and market intelligence to achieve business objectives
  

* Interface & Coordination

Provide sales reports to region based on sales per salesman/sales office, conduct monthly reconciliation in coordination with Commercial Development Supervisor to ensure accuracy and relevance of data.
  

* Reporting

Generate relevant information for the region covering volume, sales trends, market intelligence, etc
  

* Market Information Validation

Encode and validate for uniqueness relevant customer information for proper recording into sales systems.
  

Encode feedback from field force on market intelligence and generates reports needed by the regional sales team.
  

* Operational

Support Commercial Development Supervisor in overseeing commercial planning support to Sales Team (Sales Office and/or Satellite Sales Office and/or region and/or headquarters) to ensure efficient operation and that all tasks are performed in a timely manner
  

* Corporate Framework

Uphold corporate integrity and values, ensuring all activities comply with PMFTC policies and procedures, including DSD Operating Standards regarding Customer and Route Maintenance Process.
  

  

Skill and competencies:  

* Minimum 3-5 years relevant work experience in sales, sales insights, sales reporting, sales information or similar experience in database management or financial reporting.
* Advanced MS Skills required (especially in MS Excel)
* Experience in working and influencing cross-functional stakeholders

  

Work Location: Mandaue Sales Office – should be amenable to do field work in other areas in Visayas as needed  

Work Schedule: Mondays to Saturdays, no fixed schedule and can start as early as 8:00 AM  

  

What we offer  

Our success depends on the men and women who come to work every single day with a sense of purpose and an appetite for progress. Join PMI and you too can:  

* Seize the freedom to define your future and ours. We’ll empower you to take risks, experiment and explore.
* Be part of an inclusive, diverse culture, where everyone’s contribution is respected; collaborate with some of the world’s best people and feel like you belong.
* Pursue your ambitions and develop your skills with a global business – our staggering size and scale provides endless opportunities to progress.


Our above market practice on Compensation & Benefits provide you with:  

* Guaranteed 14th month pay
* HMO coverage for you and your qualified dependents
* PHP 10,000 annual medical reimbursement
* Retirement Plan
* Leave Conversion


  

At PMI, we are fostering a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace. We see diversity as our greatest strength, and are committed to building an inclusive culture and workplace reflective of the world’s diversity. Our focus is on creating an environment where our employees from across the globe can be their true selves at work, contribute their best, support each other, and drive the innovation and consumer-centricity needed to help us to achieve our vision of a smoke-free future.  

  

With huge change, comes huge opportunity. So, wherever you join us, you’ll enjoy the freedom to dream up and deliver better, brighter solutions and the space to move your career forward in endlessly different directions.

title: Graphic Artist
description:
If you have a strong eye for design, excellent creativity, and the ability to effectively communicate through visual mediums, join the Radisson Blu Moment Makers! You are responsible for creating visually appealing and engaging graphics and designs that align with the hotel's brand identity and marketing objectives. This role will collaborate closely with the marketing team to produce various materials for promotional campaigns, digital and print advertisements, signage, social media content, and more.

  

* Develop and design creative assets for various marketing channels, including digital platforms, print materials, signage, and social media.
* Conceptualize and execute visually compelling designs that effectively communicate the hotel's brand message and enhance its image.
* Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project requirements, objectives, and target audience demographics.
* Translate marketing briefs and concepts into high-quality visual designs that meet brand standards and objectives.
* Create and maintain a library of digital assets, including logos, images, and templates, ensuring consistency and brand integrity across all materials.
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends, design techniques, and software tools to continuously improve design quality and effectiveness.
* Work closely with external vendors and agencies, as needed, to ensure timely delivery and production of marketing materials.
* Assist with photo editing, retouching, and manipulation to enhance the quality and appeal of visual content.
* Support other departments within the hotel, such as events and guest services, by providing design support for various projects and initiatives.
* Maintain organized files and project documentation to facilitate efficient workflow and collaboration.

 **Radisson Blu Cebu**


Cebu City, Philippines

  

**2022 & 2023 Operational Excellence HOTEL OF THE YEAR**


**2021, 2022 & 2023 Forbes World's Best Employers, #4 Best Employer In Travel & Leisure Industry**

  

Enjoy a five-star retreat at our Cebu hotel near the city center


*Located in the heart of Cebu City, the Radisson Blu Cebu provides five-star accommodations just minutes from the Mactan Channel and right next to Cebu International Port. Enjoy sweeping views of the channel and the city as well as proximity to cultural attractions and beautiful white-sand beaches. A walkway connects the hotel to the popular SM City Cebu Mall. Corporate travelers are well placed for the city’s main business and industrial parks, and Mactan Cebu International Airport (CEB) is just 11 kilometers away.*


*Whether you’re in Cebu for business or a vacation with your loved ones, take time to relax by our stunning outdoor pool and enjoy refreshments from the Pool Bar. You can stay energized with regular workouts in our well-equipped fitness center or book a treatment in our holistic spa to feel utterly pampered.*

 **CAREERS**  

Join us in our mission to make every moment matter for our guests and be part of the most inspired hotel company in the world. At Radisson Hotel Group we believe that people are our number one asset. As one of the world’s largest hotel companies, we are always looking for great people to join our team. If this sounds like an ambition you share, then start with us.  

  

To find out more about the Radisson Hotel Group, our Culture and Beliefs, then why not visit us at careers.radissonhotels.com.
