title: Digital Marketer
description:
We are looking for an experienced, passionate, and creative Digital Marketer to join our team.

As a Digital Marketer you'll spearhead paid advertising campaign optimization, KPI reporting, and graphic creation to drive client success.

**Digital Marketer Responsibilities:**

* Optimize Facebook and Google advertising accounts, with LinkedIn expertise as a plus.
* Develop, execute, and oversee social media strategies.
* Analyze key social KPIs and generate daily reports based on performance metrics.
* Craft engaging content using design tools like Canva or Photoshop.
* Keep abreast of the latest paid advertising trends and technologies.
* Conduct copy creation and optimization.
* Monitor SEO and user engagement, offering insights for content enhancement.
* SEO optimization skills are advantageous.
* Long-form copy creation (e.g., blogs) is a plus.
* Edit/create wordpress sites is a plus

**Requirements:**

* Minimum 2 years of Digital Marketing experience.
* Proficiency in Facebook Business Manager and Google Ads.
* Familiarity with Excel and other reporting tools.
* Understanding of SEO principles and web traffic metrics.
* Experience conducting audience and buyer persona research.
* Strong grasp of social media KPIs.
* Ability to create compelling images and videos.
* Exceptional multitasking, critical thinking, and problem-solving abilities.
* Knowledge of copywriting and SEO.

To apply for the position please send your resume with your portfolio.

Job Type: Part-time

Pay: From Php250.00 per hour

Benefits:

* Work from home

Schedule:

* Night shift

Experience:

* Digital marketing: 2 years (Preferred)
* Graphic design: 2 years (Preferred)

title: Graphic Designer *URGENT* - WFH (On-Call)
description:
**On-Call Graphic Designer - REMOTE**

***!READ!***

**Job Description:**

We are seeking a highly motivated and efficient **On-Call Graphic Designer** to join our team. This position requires a designer who is exceptionally reliable, can work quickly under pressure, and is available to respond to design requests at varying hours**. The workload is manageable for someone who is well-versed in their craft.** The ideal candidate will be a creative thinker capable of conceptualizing and executing compelling visuals across various digital mediums.

**Responsibilities:**

* Design and produce graphic materials including advertisements, brochures, logos, and social media graphics.
* Work on multiple projects simultaneously and deliver high-quality outputs within tight deadlines.
* Be readily available to take on tasks as needed, accommodating flexible hours.
* Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm and develop themes and ideas for campaigns and presentations.
* Ensure all graphic materials are consistent with our brand’s aesthetic and communication standards.

**Qualifications:**

* Proficient in graphic design software, including Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator), and Canva.
* More than 2 years of professional graphic design experience.
* Ability to work swiftly and efficiently, with a keen eye for detail.
* Excellent communication skills and fluency in English.
* Strong conceptual skills with a capacity to offer creative input and develop innovative design solutions.
* A flexible schedule that allows for on-call availability to accommodate project needs at any time.
* *Video editing skills are not required but will be considered a significant advantage.*

**Application Requirements:**

* Candidates must submit a portfolio or links to previous work from other clients to be considered for this position.
* Applicants must answer all pre-screening questions as part of the application process. Applications missing these responses will not be entertained.

**Compensation:**

* The compensation for each project will range from **$3 to $5**, based on the project's complexity and requirements.

Job Types: Part-time, Temporary, Contract

Pay: From Php170.00 per hour

Expected hours: No more than 2 per week

Schedule:

* On call

Application Question(s):

* Do you have any experience with video editing? If yes, please describe the tools you use and provide examples of your work.
* What graphic design software are you proficient in? Please list all that apply.
* Can you provide a link to your online portfolio or attach examples of your past work?
* Describe a project where you had to work under a tight deadline. How did you ensure the quality of your work?
* Are you available to work on projects with little to no notice? Please specify your general availability.

Experience:

* Graphic design: 2 years (Required)

Language:

* English (Required)

title: SAP HCM Consultant_Cebu
description:
**Ready to join Accenture’s team of empowered people? We’re looking for candidates with the following skills and experience for this role. Do you fit the profile? If you do, we’d love to hear from you!**

**In adherence to Accenture’s process of Identity Verification, your resume or CV must include your photo to ensure the accuracy of your application.**

 **Who we are:**


Accenture in the Philippines is a pioneer in Accenture’s global delivery network. Over the past 30 years, we have expanded our capabilities to become a powerhouse company providing end-to-end technology and business services. As part of Accenture’s global footprint in over 120 countries, covering 40-plus industries, we have been working with the biggest companies in the country and around the globe.


Innovation, a constant at Accenture, enables us to find new ways to stay ahead of our clients’ challenges. Our inclusive, diverse, and strong culture of equality helps us constantly drive innovation in the workplace. By combining our industry expertise and the deep skills of our people with the latest technologies and our uncompromising high-performance standards, we help organizations grow their business and succeed in the digital age.  



**The work:**


As an **SAP HCM Consultant**, you will become a part of our team of experts responsible for the end-to-end system implementation and/or support of the SAP HCM Suite of modules encompassing all of the HR Functions – from Core HR Administration, Talent Acquisition, Talent Development, Talent Management, Time and Attendance, Payroll, Compensation and Benefits, Reporting, Analytics and Experience Management.


Knowledge of and experience in the HR functions and HR business processes, ability to drive requirements confirmation discussions, fit-gap analysis, prototyping and system configuration, data conversion, testing and defect management are some of the skills and activities expected to be performed in the role of a functional consultant:

**Responsibilities of the role will include:**

* Participate and understand all the project phases (Planning/Designing, Development/Configuration, System Test, Integration, Functionality Testing and UAT, Deployment, Post-go live support/Hypercare)
* Drive and/or participate in the requirements confirmation discussions / requirements gathering workshops
* Perform fit-gap analysis as needed: Analyze and assess the feasibility of client requirements, impacts and gaps in the standard delivered functionalities of SAP SuccessFactors
* Participate in the accurate creation and updating of Configuration Workbook
* Document relevant business processes and workflow approvals
* Configure and implement SuccessFactors prototypes to meet business requirements, and participate in overall configuration management
* Perform unit testing and drive and/or participate in User Acceptance Testing and System Integration Testing as needed, and participate in defect management of issues identified
* Conduct system walkthrough / demo to explain the current configuration functionalities of each iteration
* Participate in the data conversion process (extraction-transformation-loading) as applicable
* Assist with cutover planning and execution
* Responsible for the knowledge transfer of business implications and detailed requirement to the application developer(s), project manager(s) or onshore team, including status reporting.
* Provide post go-live support and application maintenance support
* Take active responsibility for agreeing on Resolution dates and resolving open queries
* Participate in identifying areas for improvement / best practices

**Client Relationship Development and Management**

* Build long-term relationships with key clients
* Managing client stakeholder relationships and communications at all stages of the project.
* Support drafting of proposals
* Practice Building
* Participate in practice building activities (e.g. thought leadership development, market offering development).
* Continuously support the development of our service offering and value proposition.
* Support development of IP and white papers.
* Collaborate with Subject Matter Experts across the business to extract required knowledge
* Prepare relevant project case studies to demonstrate capabilities

**Here’s what you’ll need:**


Experience, Expertise and Certification/s on any or some of the following SAP SuccessFactors modules is a valued attribute.


* SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central
* SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Time Off
* SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Global Benefits
* SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Payroll
* SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting Management
* SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting Marketing
* SAP SuccessFactors Onboarding 2.0
* SAP SuccessFactors Learning Management
* SAP SuccessFactors Performance and Goal Management
* SAP SuccessFactors Career Planning and Development
* SAP SuccessFactors Succession Planning
* SAP SuccessFactors People Analytics and Reporting

  

Additionally, Experience and Expertise in the modules under the SAP Human Capital Management (HCM) ECC can also serve as a baseline skill.

* SAP HCM ECC Personnel Administration
* SAP HCM ECC Organizational Management
* SAP HCM ECC Personnel Development
* SAP HCM ECC Recruitment Management / e-Recruit
* SAP HCM ECC Training and Events Management / Learning Management
* SAP HCM ECC Time Management
* SAP HCM ECC Payroll Administration
* SAP HCM ECC Compensation Management
* SAP HCM ECC Benefits Administration
* SAP HCM ECC Employee Self-Service
* SAP HCM ECC Manager Self-Service

  

**Must Have:**

* At least 1 year of Experience configuring and implementing any SuccessFactors modules.
* At least a total of 3-5 years of relevant IT or Operations experience preferably in SAP HCM/IT HR/ PeopleSoft HCM
* At least 2-3 years of experience as an Human Resource business user, HR IT administrator or any role within HR
* Experience in all aspects of SuccessFactors HCM implementation including requirements gathering, fit or gap analysis, functional design development, user acceptance testing, training and deployment activities
* Experience on working with clients on requirements and business process definition, Software Development/Systems Integration and Application Support
* Ability to document and present solution using various methods (client facing, presentations, and demos)
* Knowledge of HR business process design and development
* Technology consulting expertise, and ability to drive workshops and training sessions.
* Willing to travel for possible onshore requirements.

 **Key Skills**

* Good analytical skills to help our customers to find best solutions for their business requirements
* Good interpersonal skills, including strong verbal and written communication
* Able to work under pressure without any supervision, and a good team player

**Professional qualifications**

* Demonstrated academic achievement in tertiary qualifications including Business, Economics, Engineering, Law or Science

**Consulting Skills and Personality**

* Proven ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment.
* Excellent leadership and interpersonal skills.
* Planning and coordinating of own and/or team's work activities to meet commitments and quality expectations.
* Strong communication skills (speaking, writing, listening) with excellent executive presence.
* Ability to understand critical success factors for our clients and their industry.
* Previous consulting experience / Exposure to Internal project work.
* Adept at using experience and knowledge of industry, geographical and technology trends to assess and shape business solutions.
* Understanding of technology and its application to business.
* Enthusiastic and able to drive own activities with minimum supervision.
* Willingness to travel.

title: Sales and Marketing Associate
description:
As a Sales and Marketing Associate at Rock On Boulder Gym, you will play a crucial role in driving our business growth through B2B sales and effective marketing strategies. You will be instrumental in building partnerships with schools, universities, and businesses to promote our gym’s programs and events. Your role will also involve supporting our social media efforts, engaging with existing customers, and assisting in the organization and execution of events.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Identify and cultivate partnerships with educational institutions and businesses to encourage their participation in our gym's offerings.
* Develop proposals and presentations to effectively communicate the value of our gym’s programs to potential partners.
* Assist in the creation and scheduling of compelling content across various social media platforms.
* Create raw video and photo materials for use in our digital presence.
* Respond promptly to inquiries and comments on social media platforms.
* Implement strategies to retain existing customers and upsell gym memberships.
* Support the planning and execution of events hosted at the gym.
* Coordinate with different teams to ensure seamless event logistics.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
* At least 2 years of experience in sales, marketing, or a related business role.
* Proficiency in social media platforms and content creation tools.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work flexibly and manage multiple priorities.
* Basic knowledge of climbing and climbing equipment is preferred but not required.

**What We Offer:**

* A dynamic work environment with opportunities to contribute to the growth of an exciting recreational facility.
* Unlimited free access to our gym facilities

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Pay: Php25,000.00 - Php30,000.00 per month

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule
* Gym membership
* Health insurance

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Flextime

Supplemental pay types:

* 13th month salary
* Commission pay

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* Sales and Marketing: 1 year (Preferred)

Language:

* English (Required)

License/Certification:

* Driver's License (Preferred)

title: Remote Lead Generation Specialist
description:
We are seeking a skilled and proactive **Remote Lead Generation Specialist** to join our marketing team. As a Lead Generation Specialist, you will be responsible for identifying and qualifying potential leads for our sales team. This role requires a combination of strategic thinking, data analysis, and effective communication skills.  

  

  

**Responsibilities:**  

  

  

* Research and identify potential leads through various channels, including online research, social media, industry events, and networking.
* Develop and implement lead generation strategies to attract and engage target audiences.
* Use marketing automation tools and CRM software to manage and track lead generation activities.
* Qualify leads based on predefined criteria and prioritize them for follow-up by the sales team.
* Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to optimize lead generation processes and strategies.
* Create and optimize landing pages, email campaigns, and other digital marketing initiatives to capture and convert leads.
* Monitor and analyze lead generation performance metrics to identify areas for improvement.
* Stay informed about industry trends, market dynamics, and competitor activities to refine lead generation tactics.
Requirements:
* Proven experience in lead generation, digital marketing, or related roles.
* Strong understanding of lead generation techniques and best practices.
* Proficiency in using marketing automation tools (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo) and CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, Zoho).
* Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and optimize performance.
* Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities to develop effective lead-generation campaigns.
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
* Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field is preferred but not required.
This role offers the opportunity to be part of a dynamic sales team and contribute to the growth of our business. If you are passionate about sales, enjoy interacting with customers, and are motivated by achieving goals, we encourage you to apply for this position.

title: Customer Service Agent
description:
The Newrich Network is hiring a customer service agent to handle incoming support tickets for our digital platforms.


This is an AWESOME opportunity to get in on the ground floor of a fast growing startup!


As a Customer Service Agent, you will report to our Customer Success Manager and be joining an energetic, supportive team with a proven track record of delivering high impact and value to our clients.


The Customer Success team is one of the most important teams in our business as they fuel our growth by ensuring customers have a first-class experience. It's a challenging role, balancing both commercial and experiential priorities, but get it right and it's one of the most rewarding in the company. This is a rare opportunity to help shape an exciting business from the outset, working in a passionate, welcoming team with the chance to succeed in a growing market.

**Requirements**

* Reports to Customer Success Manager; Promptly and accurately respond to our customer’s inquiries regardless of channel submitted
* Provide timely follow up to customer downloads and support requests
* Escalates customer inquiries when and where appropriate
* Document activities in the tickets tracking/support application as well as Project Tracker
* Following up with user issues
* Communicate user issues to QA team
* Tracking bugs and issues in our platform
* Work with marketing to develop or create training materials, videos and knowledge base articles
* Develop and maintain expertise on all products, systems and processes
* Perform billing duties, including completing customer transactions over the phone, issuing refunds as needed, researching past billing discrepancies and taking care of product exchanges.
* Placing new order/volume orders, handling existing orders, returns/replacements and online orders
* Update customer databases including: contact details, past complaints, resolutions, billing information, and shipments.
* Resolve complaints and customer problems in an efficient, professional and friendly manner.
* Educate customers on the product for optimal understanding.
* Your primary goal is satisfying the customers needs while continuing to earn their business.

**Annual Salary**  

Ranges from 12,000 to 15,000 USD

**Benefits**


Our current list of benefits can be found here - newrich.com/careers

title: Branding and Marketing Lead with SEO Expertise
description:
**Description**

**ABOUT US** 

BSA Solutions provides talent outsourcing services to small and medium-sized businesses. We offer global businesses access to highly skilled professionals from the Philippines and Malaysia, enabling global businesses to build their offshore dream teams. Our vision is to be where the best minds meet to build a community of successful companies. We help talents chart their professional careers and allow our clients to focus on strategic and high-level tasks while we care for their talent management needs. We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional results through our personalised services and our in-depth knowledge of the markets we serve. With BSA Solutions, you can be assured of a reliable and efficient partner in building your career.

**HEADLINE**

Are you an experienced **Branding and Marketing Lead with a strong background in SEO** (Search Engine Optimization)? Do you have a passion for building compelling brands, developing innovative marketing strategies, and optimizing digital content for maximum visibility and engagement? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you!

**This is a full-time, permanent position Monday to Friday from 7.00 AM – 4.00 PM.** 

**Office-based position in central Cebu City.** 

**To start in May 2024.** 

* Grab the opportunity you need to do your best work, working in a dynamic environment.
* Be part of a culture of equity, diversity, and inclusion, where you can showcase your unique talents and expertise to create successful outcomes for our clients.
* Grow and develop your career with us through our technical and professional development programs.
* Join us and connect and collaborate with the best and brightest talents, building a community of successful companies.
* Competitive Salary Package + generous benefits + personalized learning and development.

**ABOUT THE ROLE** 

We are seeking a talented and experienced **Branding and Marketing Lead with a strong background in SEO** (Search Engine Optimization) to drive our company's branding and marketing efforts. The ideal candidate will have a passion for building compelling brands, developing innovative marketing strategies, and optimizing digital content for maximum visibility and engagement. This role requires a creative thinker with proven expertise in SEO techniques, content marketing, and brand management. The Branding and Marketing Lead will play a critical role in shaping our brand identity, expanding our online presence, and driving business growth.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Brand Strategy and Development:**

* Develop and execute comprehensive branding strategies to enhance the company's brand identity, visibility, and reputation.
* Define brand positioning, messaging, and voice to ensure consistency across all marketing channels and communications.
* Conduct market research and analysis to identify target audiences, market trends, and competitive landscapes.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate brand strategies into marketing campaigns, product launches, and corporate initiatives.

**Digital Marketing and SEO:**

* Lead the planning and implementation of digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including social media, email, and paid advertising.
* Utilize SEO best practices to optimize website content, meta tags, and keywords for improved search engine rankings and organic traffic.
* Conduct keyword research, competitive analysis, and performance tracking to identify opportunities for SEO optimization and content strategy refinement.
* Monitor and analyze website traffic, user behavior, and conversion rates to measure the effectiveness of SEO efforts and make data-driven recommendations for improvement.

**Content Creation and Management:**

* Develop high-quality, engaging content for digital platforms, including website pages, blog posts, social media updates, and email newsletters.
* Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to create compelling visual and written content that aligns with brand messaging and objectives.
* Manage content calendars, editorial schedules, and content distribution channels to ensure timely and consistent delivery of content to target audiences.
* Monitor content performance metrics and user feedback to identify content gaps, optimize content strategies, and enhance user engagement and retention.

**Brand Monitoring and Reputation Management:**

* Monitor online conversations, reviews, and mentions to assess brand sentiment and identify opportunities for brand enhancement or reputation management.
* Respond promptly and professionally to customer inquiries, feedback, and complaints across digital channels to maintain positive brand perception and customer satisfaction.
* Implement strategies to proactively manage brand reputation and mitigate potential risks or crises, working closely with PR and communications teams as needed.

**Requirements**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business Administration, or related field. Master's degree or specialized certification in Digital Marketing or SEO is a plus.
* Proven experience (5+ years) in branding, marketing, and digital strategy, with a focus on SEO and online content optimization.
* Deep understanding of SEO principles, algorithms, and best practices, with a track record of improving search engine rankings and driving organic traffic growth.
* Strong analytical skills and proficiency in SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, or Moz.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft compelling brand narratives and marketing messages.
* Creative thinker with a keen eye for design and storytelling, and a passion for innovation and continuous improvement.
* Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, meet tight deadlines, and work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
* Strong leadership and collaboration skills, with the ability to influence stakeholders, build consensus, and drive cross-functional teamwork.

**Preferred Skills:**

* Experience with branding and marketing in B2B or technology-driven industries.
* Familiarity with graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator) for creating visual content.
* Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and website development platforms (WordPress, Drupal) for making on-page SEO optimizations.
* Experience with marketing automation platforms (HubSpot, Marketo) and CRM systems for lead generation and customer relationship management.

This position offers an exciting opportunity for a strategic marketer and SEO expert to lead the development and implementation of branding and marketing initiatives that drive business growth and customer engagement. The Branding and Marketing Lead will have the opportunity to make a significant impact on our brand presence and market positioning in a rapidly evolving industry landscape.

Benefits

**BSA Solutions, Inc. offers:** 

* Comprehensive financial rewards and benefits that exceed market standards and the requirements of the Philippines Labor Law.
* Comprehensive and generous HMO benefits package for you and one dependent from the start date.
* Regular professional development coaching and mentoring to help you map out your personal and professional development plan.
* Broad selection of exciting and engaging social events to embrace as a vibrant BSA community.
* Psychologically safe environment for you to develop your skills and talent consistent with BSA values; and
* Frequent webcasts and discussion forums by senior leaders to obtain feedback and ideas, and genuinely interested in hearing what you have to say.

We are an Equal Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to gender, gender identity/orientation, race, color, religion, origin, or any other characteristics protected by applicable law.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Php50,000.00 - Php55,000.00 per month

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Afternoon shift
* Monday to Friday

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
Hi! We’re Smartsourcing, looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist who can work with us full-time and on-site!:
  
  

Where? Crown 7 Business Centre, Pope John Paul II Ave, Cebu City, Cebu:
  
  

**Earn up to P40,000!:**  

**As a Digital Marketing Specialist,:**  

You'll get to flex your skills in crafting exciting digital marketing campaigns that drive leads, boost our client’s online presence, and make a real impact on their business goals. If you live and breathe the digital world and have a knack for turning data into actionable results, we want you.
  
  

**Some of the things we expect you to do are to::**  

* Campaign Creation & Execution: Develop and launch creative digital marketing campaigns across a variety of channels like social media, email, search engines, and more.
* Content Master: Write compelling blog posts, website copy, email sequences, and social media content that engages our audience and shows off our brand's voice.
* SEO Wizardry: Conduct keyword research, optimize website content, and track SEO performance to help us climb those search engine rankings.
* Paid Advertising Strategist: Manage paid advertising campaigns (think Google Ads, and social media ads) with a focus on results and optimization.
* Data Analyst in Disguise: Analyze website traffic, campaign metrics, and other data to uncover insights, measure success, and guide future strategies.
* Team Collaborator: Work closely with designers, content writers, and other marketing rockstars to bring campaigns to life!


**Requirements:**  

**We would need you to be or have the following::**  

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
* 1-3 years of proven experience in a digital marketing role.
* Adept at Canva.
* Solid understanding of SEO, SEM, content marketing, email marketing, and social media best practices.
* Experience with Google Analytics, Google Ads, and other marketing analytics tools.
* Excellent writing, verbal communication, and presentation skills.
* A knack for creative problem-solving and a data-driven approach.
* Up-to-date knowledge of the latest digital marketing trends.


**Benefits:**  

**Be a part of the Smartsourcing crew !:**  

Smartsourcing was born with the purpose of changing people’s lives. Our goal is not only to make sure businesses grow and succeed but also, that you love where you work and thrive. We recruit, train, and support you and provide great benefits. We take pride in the fact we are an award-winning organisation, hailed as one of the best employers and workplaces in Asia as seen on Great Place to Work and HR Asia.
  
  

**Here’s why we think you’d love working at Smartsourcing…:**  

At Smartsourcing, we’re all about fostering a positive work environment for you. We’re always looking for folks who are unafraid to be their absolute authentic selves because we value diversity and inclusion.
  
We’re proud to be a certified Great Place to Work. We believe that we can expect the best out of you only when you're happy with where you work and what you do. This is why It is so vital for us that you have a healthy work-life balance.
  
  

**Some of our company perks include::**  

* Above-industry salary package
* Day Shift
* Fixed weekends off
* ‍ ️ HMO coverage for you and your dependent/s after one (1) month
* Free lunch every day
* Free coffee every day (latte, americano, or cappuccino) made by our in-house barista
* ️ Sports wellness clubs including free-diving
* ️ Subsidized gym membership at Anytime Fitness
* ✈️ Travel opportunities to Australia
* Exclusive discounts in selected restaurants and merchants
* And so much more!

title: Client Success Consultant
description:
At Spirit Media we are reinventing Christian Publishing in 3 ways:

* Connecting publishing and branding together.
* Marketing before publishing.
* Publishing in every format everywhere.

Our mission is to publish His glorious deeds among the nations. To tell everyone the great things he has done. - Psalm 96:3

We believe the message of God through the people of God is worthy to be taken to the nations.

As you serve the company in the capacity described below, you are actively involved in helping us accomplish our mission. What you do matters!

We invite you to join our team of rockstars:

**Job Title:** Client Success Consultant

**Job Description:**

As a valued member of our Client Management Team, we expect you to be highly organized, execute communication very well and strategic execution for our clients for their publishing and marketing needs. You will work closely with clients to understand their objectives, develop tailored strategies, and execute comprehensive marketing plans to enhance their brand presence and achieve their goals.

**Term:** Full-time | permanent | immediate

**Schedule:** 8am - 5pm EST Monday - Friday

**Pay:** $6-8/hour

**KEY DUTIES and RESPONSIBILITIES:**

* **Strategic Planning:** Understand clients' publishing and marketing goals. Develop effective master marketing strategies to boost their brand, products, or services.
* **Branding Guide Creation:** Craft detailed branding guides that capture the essence of the client's brand, including visuals, tone, and messaging.
* **Master Marketing Plan Development:** Create comprehensive marketing plans covering SEO, digital marketing, social media, email, and traditional advertising (as needed). Ensure plans align with client goals and budget.
* **Execution and Implementation:** Implement marketing plans precisely using Spirit Media resources. Coordinate with teams for timely delivery and quality.
* **Client Relationship Management:** Build strong client relationships, understanding their needs and goals. Collaborate with internal teams and managers to support clients and advocate for their interests.
* **Performance Monitoring and Reporting**: Track campaign performance against KPIs. Generate detailed reports, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
* **Opportunity Identification:** Stay updated on market trends, competitors, and opportunities. Recommend strategic initiatives for client growth and competitiveness.

**QUALIFICATIONS:**

* Digital marketing experience is required.
* Must have an aggressive “can-do” attitude
* Have excellent written and verbal communication skills and is comfortable talking on the phone with teammates and clients whenever necessary
* Responsible, trustworthy and always reliable
* Organizational Skills: time management, task prioritization, attention to detail.
* Proficient in data analysis and reporting, with the capability to derive actionable insights from marketing performance metrics.
* Comfortable working in a fast-paced and dynamic environment, with the flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and client needs.

Please send your resume and application to

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Pay: From Php339.65 per hour

Expected hours: 40 per week

Benefits:

* Work from home

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Late shift

title: Finance Coordinator: AR/AP Specialist
description:
**Company Description** ***Jetfuel.agency*** is a digital marketing agency specializing in growing businesses within the DTC and e-commerce space. Our clients are usually between $5M - $50M in size and rave about our agency’s ability to drive measurable performance, no BS attitude and our innovative, ground-breaking digital marketing strategies. We are a small, fast-growing agency. From content to paid media, we value people who have a strategic and analytical mindset no matter what they do.


Please note that we are a fully remote agency. We are looking for people who not only have a passion for marketing but will also contribute to our agency’s culture and team.


If you want to make an impact, working with clients such as **Perfect Snacks, Vive Organic or Tate's Bake Shop** and join a small, fast-growing agency that offers more learning opportunities to help your career vs. any other agency, this is the right place for you!

 **Job Description**  

Jetfuel.agency is currently seeking two part-time accountants to join our finance team. The primary responsibility of these positions is to meticulously maintain accurate financial records, manage cash flow, and facilitate seamless financial transactions. Successful candidates will engage in extensive collaboration with internal and external teams, ensuring financial precision, compliance, and the overall effectiveness of our financial operations.


If you possess a keen attention to detail and thrive in a collaborative environment, this opportunity is tailored for you!

 **Qualifications** **Principal Responsibilities / Accountabilities**

* Manage and maintain cash flow for the organization
* Handling payroll transactions with the internal financial software
* Handle accounts receivable and accounts payable functions
* Oversee collections and invoicing
* Assist with purchasing and procurement activities
* Collaborates with accountants, as needed

**Experience and Qualifications**

* Prior experience in bookkeeping, cash management, or related financial roles
* Familiarity with payroll processes and internal financial software
* Understanding of accounts receivable and accounts payable functions
* Proficiency in managing collections and invoicing
* Knowledge of purchasing and procurement activities
* Strong attention to detail and accuracy in financial transactions
* Ability to collaborate effectively with accountants and other team members
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
* Strong organizational and time management skills

**Must-Have’s:**

* Data entry skills
* Payroll Accounting skills
* Advance to mastery level in Excel or related spreadsheet program
* Ability to work effectively in a remote and multicultural environment
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to adapt to changing priorities
* Strong ethics and integrity in handling financial information
* Proactive and self-motivated approach to work
* Ability to meet deadlines and work well under pressure
* Flexibility to work across different time zones, as required
* Commitment to maintaining confidentiality of sensitive financial data

title: Video Editor (REMOTE)
description:
Join our dynamic team at Storyy (storyy.co), a leading marketing tech company that empowers business owners and executives to build a strong online presence and foster meaningful relationships through innovative content solutions.

We are currently seeking talented VIDEO EDITORS to enhance our team and contribute to our exciting industry.

**WHAT WE OFFER:**

* 5 days of paid time off (PTO) plus multiple paid holidays
* Birthday Incentives
* A culture-oriented work environment
* Incentive programs to reward your hard work
* Accessible and supportive leadership
* Thriving team environment within the ever-evolving marketing tech field

**JOB ROLE:**

As an editor, you will play a crucial role in editing videos for use across social media and websites. Your responsibilities will include:

* Editing shorter clips from the longer source material
* Adding captions to videos using text or .srt files
* Formatting videos according to popular trends, such as meme-style videos, vertical videos, and 4:5 format

**REQUIREMENTS:**

To be considered for this position, you must meet the following requirements:

* Expertise in using Adobe Creative Suite tools
* Prior experience in editing videos specifically for social media platforms
* Creative flair in editing videos according to specified timestamps
* Possess a creative mindset, adhering to established processes while occasionally exploring new ideas.
* Background in digital marketing is a plus (not mandatory)
* Comfortable in using a time-tracking device the entire shift

**TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:**

To ensure smooth operations, it is essential that you meet the following technical requirements:

PC/Laptop specifications:

* CPU: Ryzen 5 or Core i7 as a minimum
* Minimum 16 GB RAM
* Video card with at least 4 GB (e.g., rx570 - ATI Radeon or GTX 1050 - Nvidia)
* Stable internet connection with a minimum speed of 25 Mbps (wired connection preferred)

title: Creative Marketing Designer
description:
**NVISION DIGITAL SOLUTIONS INC.** is a provider of end-to-end digital solutions and services focused on commercial LCD & LED products, integrated displays, digital signage media players, interactive smart displays, touch programs, applications, hospitality TVs, and screen equipment rentals.

We are glad to announce that our office is expanding and we need a goal-oriented, positive, and potential individual who can join our team.

We are **URGENTLY** looking for:

**CREATIVE DESIGNER**

**Job Summary:**

We are looking for a Creative Marketing Designer who will be at the forefront of merging imaginative design with strategic marketing initiatives. This role is dedicated to crafting compelling visual content that supports our sales team and engages our target audience, driving brand awareness and business growth. The ideal candidate will bring creative design skills and marketing savvy, capable of conceptualizing and executing marketing materials that resonate with customers and align with our brand strategy.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Visual Content Creation:** Design and produce various materials, including brochures, newsletters, presentation templates, advertising materials, and digital content, that align with our marketing strategies and support sales efforts.

**Strategic Design and Marketing:** Actively participate in strategy sessions with the marketing team to conceptualize marketing campaigns. Offer creative and innovative ideas for engaging target audiences and enhancing brand presence.

**3D Modeling, Video, and Animation:** Utilize 3D modeling, video editing, and animation skills to create immersive and interactive content that tells our brand story and showcases our products or services.

**Photo Manipulation:** Employ manipulation techniques to create visually appealing images that enhance marketing messages and campaigns.

**Brand Strategy Execution:** Ensure that all creative content is consistent with our brand identity, values, and messaging across various platforms and mediums.

**Collaboration and Project Management:** Collaborate with sales, marketing, and external partners to ensure that projects are executed effectively and efficiently, from concept through completion.

**Market Trends and Insights:** Stay abreast of the latest trends in design, marketing, and technology, applying insights to innovate and improve marketing outcomes.

Qualifications:

* Atleast 1 year experience working as a Graphic Designer
* Bachelor’s degree in graphic design, Marketing, or a related field, with a strong portfolio demonstrating creative design work and marketing campaigns.
* Proven experience in graphic design and marketing, with expertise in Adobe Creative Suite, 3D modeling software, and video editing tools.
* Creative and strategic thinker who can develop new ideas and concepts that align with business objectives.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with a track record of working effectively across different teams.
* Strong project management skills, capable of leading projects from inception to completion within tight deadlines.
* A keen eye for design and detail and a passion for brand storytelling.

**You will enjoy**...

- Competitive Salary based on work experience and qualifications

- Monthly Salary with Paid Holidays

- Government statutory benefits

- Company issued postpaid plan with device

- Monthly Meal Allowance

- Performance Based Career Growth

- Company Meals, Outings & Teambuilding

- Birthday Bash

- HMO (Health Insurance)

- Personal Accident Insurance

- Company Bonuses (discretionary)

- Monday to Friday Workdays

- Service Incentive Leave upon regularization

Interested applicant may submit their application through: **https://forms.gle/bdDVrvqDCSvuPc8x5**

title: Sales Account Executive (Hybrid Setup)
description:
As a Sales Account Executive at Emerge, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth through effective sales and marketing strategies. Your primary responsibilities will include meeting sales targets, generating leads, nurturing client relationships, and collaborating with the marketing and sales teams to achieve organizational goals.

**Job responsibilities:** 

**Sales Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement sales strategies to meet and exceed management-set sales goals.
* Research prospects and generate leads through various channels.
* Contact potential and existing clients via phone, email, social media, and in-person interactions.
* Handle client inquiries, questions, and complaints effectively.
* Deliver high-impact presentations showcasing company services and solutions.
* Manage the sales process efficiently through EmergeOne CRM.
* Achieve daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets.
* Participate actively in sales team meetings.

**Marketing Responsibilities:**

* Contribute to the development of comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with sales objectives.
* Collaborate with the sales team to develop targeted sales strategies and campaigns.
* Track sales data to ensure the company meets sales quotas.
* Gather correct customer information during conversations to schedule appointments.
* Actively source new business opportunities.
* Set up qualified meeting appointments through phone calls, email, and LinkedIn DMs.
* Follow-up with warm leads (outbound and inbound).
* Conduct A/B testing and report on sales cadences across email, phone calls, and LinkedIn views/messages.
* Exceed sales targets and conduct 200 dials daily.
* Provide significant insights and contribute creative strategies to the CEO and Director of Marketing.

**Requirements:**

* **Experience with International sales presentations/meeting calls is a must**
* At least 1 to 2 years of experience in a similar role
* Background in sales
* Comfortable with cold calls and cold emails
* Experience leveraging Zoho / HubSpot CRM
* **HUGE BONUS:** Understanding of digital marketing (SEO, content marketing, CRO, paid media)
* **HUGE BONUS:** Experience setting sales demo appointments with senior-level marketers (owners, marketing directors, VPs, CMOs, etc.)

**Tech Requirements:**

* Noise-canceling headset (professional ones, not mobile headsets)
* PC/Laptop > at least Intel i3 with 4GB RAM
* Stable Internet connection > at least 20mbps download
* Quiet workspace

**Perks & Benefits:**

* Hybrid Setup
* Paid training
* Allowance
* Anniversary Romance Leave
* Menstrual Leave
* Mental Health Break Leave
* Point-based Reward Program
* Birthday Leave
* Mental Health Initiatives (Professional Consultation)

title: Marketing Officer / Associate
description:
We are currently seeking a highly motivated and creative **Marketing Communications Associate** to join our Sales & Marketing Department. In this role, you will collaborate with various internal teams under the guidance of the Corporate Communications Manager to develop effective marketing strategies and execute marketing activities to achieve our group's sales targets. The primary focus will be on our brands, BE Residences and Living Ideas, under Benedict Ventures Inc.

Responsibilities:

I. Marketing Communications

* Work closely with the Sales & Marketing Department and internal teams to develop marketing strategies and conceptualize activities to achieve sales targets.
* Execute and roll out marketing and communications plans for BE Residences and Living Ideas, including above-the-line advertising (print, TV, Cable, radio, out of home) and below-the-line materials (collateral, brochures, etc.).
* Develop marketing presentation formats and materials in line with brand guidelines.
* Coordinate with internal teams and external partners for the production and execution of marketing materials.
* Monitor artwork requests specific to Benedict Ventures Inc. (BVI) and ensure timely delivery.
* Manage marketing events and provide assistance to other properties or departments as needed.
* Track campaign performance and prepare marketing reports for management.
* Assist in the rollout of CSR campaigns for BE Residences in alignment with the BE THE SPARK CSR campaign of the total BE brand.
* Support corporate marketing communication efforts for the total BE Group.
* Conduct regular competitive and market research, as well as surveys requested by the COO.
* Develop copy for corporate requirements of sister companies within the total BE Group, including press releases, web content, and below-the-line materials.

II. Digital Marketing

* Gather and analyze consumer behavior data, including web traffic and rankings for BE Residences and its projects.
* Create content for digital and online display advertising campaigns, collaborating with the Graphic Designer.
* Manage the marketing database for effective email and SMS campaigns.
* Assist the Corporate Communications Supervisor in planning and managing social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, etc.).
* Prepare accurate reports on the overall performance of digital marketing campaigns.
* Stay updated on the latest trends and technologies affecting the industry.
* Evaluate metrics related to website traffic, service quotas, and target audience.
* Oversee and manage contests, giveaways, and other digital projects.

III. Organization & Management

* Report directly to the Corporate Communications Supervisor.
* Maintain the physical inventory of marketing collaterals for BE Residences and Living Ideas, facilitating replacement or new orders as necessary.
* Maintain confidentiality of internal information, trade secrets, and related company information.
* Uphold the company's corporate values and comply with policies and procedures.
* Perform other related tasks and duties as assigned.

Qualifications:

* Marketing graduate with or without experience.
* Possesses a good personality and excellent communication skills.
* Familiarity with product marketing strategies, creativity, and agility.
* Basic knowledge of Photoshop or Canva.

Join our dynamic team and contribute to the success of our brands under the BE Group. Apply today and be part of our exciting journey!

title: EVA / Accounts Manager - AI
description:
We seek an experienced **Executive Virtual Assistant / Accounts Manager** to help support our private sector business development efforts. This individual will act as the first point of contact for prospective clients. S/he will build long-lasting, mutually beneficial relationships with prospective clients, always striving to find opportunities to provide more value through new offerings and customized services. To succeed in this role, a candidate should have exceptional communication, computer, and problem-solving skills. An ideal candidate will be resourceful, analytical, adaptable, and organized with the ability to build a rapport with clients. This individual will co-manage the front end of our sales funnel. S/he will also be in charge of scheduling, maintaining contacts with clients, and booking client presentations. Additionally, s/he will be comfortable interacting with prospective clients on LinkedIn (and other social media platforms), virtual networking events, online conferences, and trade shows.

**Responsibilities:**

● Work with the business development team to nurture leads while conducting outreach to prospective clients via social media and other sales and marketing channels.

● Must be ABLE to use ALL Tech and AI (Artificial Intelligence) tools to get the job done such as ‘ChatGPT’, ‘DALL-E’ 'Jotform', Google Drive, Google Meet, Zoom, Slack, Google Calendar, Calendly, Google Docs, Google Sheets, and maybe a bit of designing.

● Handle the scheduling of initial presentations to clients on behalf of the CEO and project manager.

● Establish, build, and maintain strong relationships with clients.

● Work with technical and business development teams to identify opportunities to provide additional services or value for existing and new clients.

● Respond to clients’ inquiries received via email, text messages, and phone calls.

● Multi-task between various inquiries and systems in a fast-paced environment.

● Provide data and feedback to help refine digital marketing strategy.

**Skills and Qualifications:**

● At least 2 years of relevant sales experience (in IT, construction, or real estate) with a strong emphasis on customer service and satisfaction.

● Must possess extensive knowledge of how to nurture a lead.

● Keen listening, strong observation, and exceptional communication (written and verbal) skills are required.

● A baseline understanding of technology, real estate, and/ or construction (or the ability to learn quickly) with the ability to ask probing questions is highly preferred.

● Must possess strong research and analytical skills along with a growth mindset.

● Must be comfortable interacting in a virtual environment.

Pay scale: **$15-$30 an hour based on your experience and profile**

**To Apply:**

Please send your resume, cover letter, a 2 to 5-minute introductory recording (mp3 or mp4 formats only, preferably mp4 format), Voice or video recording should include your name, a summary of relevant experience, and why you believe you are a good fit for this position and send them directly to this email **Sheheryar@coachakenterprises.com and cc to admin@coachakenterprises.com**

Thanks and good luck!

title: Campaign Coordinator
description:
**Job Overview**

We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Campaign Coordinator to spearhead the direction of all campaigns and paid media initiatives. The ideal candidate will be passionate about digital marketing, possess excellent project management skills, and have a keen eye for detail. This role requires strategic thinking, creativity, and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve campaign objectives and drive results.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and execute comprehensive campaign strategies across various digital channels, including but not limited to social media, display advertising, email marketing, and PPC.
* Lead the planning, implementation, and optimization of paid media campaigns to drive brand awareness, engagement, and conversion.
* Conduct thorough market research and analysis to identify target audiences, industry trends, and competitive landscapes to inform campaign strategies.
* Collaborate closely with internal stakeholders, including marketing, creative, and analytics teams, to ensure alignment of campaign objectives, messaging, and KPIs.
* Manage campaign budgets, timelines, and resources effectively to deliver projects on time and within budget.
* Monitor campaign performance metrics, analyze data insights, and provide actionable recommendations for continuous improvement and optimization.
* Stay up-to-date with emerging trends, technologies, and best practices in digital marketing and paid media to maintain a competitive edge.
* Does other tasks as needed.

**Qualifications:**

* Proven experience in digital marketing, and an experience in a management role.
* Proven track record of developing and executing successful digital marketing campaigns.
* Strong analytical skills and the ability to use data to make data-driven decisions.
* Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
* Strong project management skills and the ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.
* Knowledge of digital marketing tools and platforms, including Google Analytics, Facebook Ads Manager, and Google Ads.
* Ability to adapt to a fast-paced environment, prioritize tasks effectively, and work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
* Familiarity with content marketing best practices, including content creation, distribution, and measurement.
* Understanding of UX/UI design principles and web development processes to support the creation of effective landing pages and digital experiences.
* Ability to identify and implement innovative marketing strategies that drive growth and improve client outcomes.

title: Sales and Marketing Assistant | Cebu
description:
INQUIRER.net is the official news website and member of the Inquirer Group of Companies that includes the Philippine Daily Inquirer, Hinge Inquirer Publications, Cebu Daily News, Inquirer LIBRE, Bandera, INQUIRER.net, Megamobile Inquirer, Print Town, DZIQ 990AM Radyo Inquirer and DAG.
  
  

It features 24/7 breaking news, the latest on local and international issues and events, and compelling commentaries on Politics, Entertainment, Sports, Lifestyle, Business, and Technology. It also features Global Nation for OFWs who want to know more about the latest from the Philippines.
  
  

INQUIRER.net offers multimedia features, easy channel navigation, strong social media presence and numerous engagement platforms that allow the readers to experience and be part of the news no matter where they are.
  
1. Schedules and implements Cebu Daily News Digital advertising campaigns by uploading all marketing/partner content (social media and website) as stated in signed contracts.
  
  

2. Ensures that all client campaigns are executed on time.
  
  

3. Maintains client advertising deliverable logs and ensures all advertising execution links are saved for easy tracking.
  
  

4. Delivery of post-campaign reporting.
  
  

5. Update sales decks and info kits monthly for advertising clients.
  
  

6. Develops Cebu Daily News Digital in-house brand campaigns and brand content for revenue purposes and is accountable for the brand/marketing push of Cebu Daily News Digital assets, and platforms by way of marketing campaigns.
  
  

**7. Works on all Cebu-based marketing partnership projects:**  

Seek out relevant partnerships.
  
  

Create and evaluate partnership proposals.
  
  

Contract management for all marketing partnerships.
  
  

Facilitate follow-through of all partnership deliverables.
  
  

Put measures to safeguard and put Inquirer Interactive Inc. and Cebu Daily News Digital brand identities in place for partner sites and advertisers.
  
  

End-to-end delivery of projects for partnership contracts.
  
  

8. Competitive monitoring for the sales and marketing team.
  
  

9. Works on talent management for Cebu Daily News Digital.
  
  

10. Accountable for the regular audience/advertiser/readership promotion of Cebu Daily News Digital.
  
  

11. Performs other related tasks that may be assigned.
  
  

**Education:**  

College Graduate, preferably Marketing Management/Business Management and/or other related courses.
  
  

**Qualification:**  

Must be willing to be based in Cebu, In-depth knowledge of all things Cebu, Required languages/dialects: Cebuano, English, Filipino, Must be able to thrive working in a virtual/remote setting.
  
  

**Work Experience:**  

At least 1 year experience in a related job.
  
  

**Knowledge and Skills:**  

Computer Skills, Communication Skills, Attention to Details, Skills Creative and Resourceful, Can work with minimum supervision; Must be able to thrive in a virtual working environment.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
**DigitalMarketing Specialist**

**This is a fully remote position. However, the interview is held in person.**

We are an elite SEO company based in the United States with over 13 years of being in business.

Be a part of our team! The applicant must be able to meet in person Friday and Saturday, March 29th and 30th, 2024. It will be a 30 minute interview. The right applicants will have the following qualifications.

* Expert in on and off-page SEO
* 3 – 5 years of experience in successfully developing and executing SEO campaigns
* Applicants must pass a SEMrush, Tag Manager, and Google Search Console test during the interview- if unable to pass, do not apply.
* Implement all aspects of a successful SEO strategy, including technical and content optimization, link management, and SEO tools.
* Must be proficient with backlinking.
* Must be able to lead a team and be able to train.
* Must also be proficient with Google Tag Manager
* Must be familiar with PPC ad management and creating large PPC ads.
* Find the most efficient and effective way to complete the SEO actions generated by our simple SEO technology. Provide informative feedback and challenge the way of thinking when required.
* Deliver client-ready documentation to an exceptional standard and strive to set new performance benchmarks for quality and efficiency.
* Develop an excellent working relationship with your team, more comprehensive organization, and management while focusing on strategy/project performance timelines, delivery, and action results.
* Track, report, and analyze website analytics and initiatives.
* Work with the development team to ensure SEO best practices are properly implemented on newly developed code.
* Recommend changes to website architecture, content, links, and other factors to improve SEO positions for target keywords of the customer’s business.
* Meet the required Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), Strategic Goals, and objectives for the team, department, and organization.
* Conducting SEO website audits using SEMrush
* Creating and implementing strong on-page optimization strategies
* Creating and implementing off-site optimization strategies and link analysis
* Developing link-building strategies
* Expert in SEMrush and other SEO tools
* Experience with SEO industry programs like Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and Google Business Profile.
* A positive attitude
* Active communication in English, both verbal and written, is required.
* Ability to take ownership over your work.

**For ImmediateHire**  
Are you a fast-working, task-oriented person? Actual SEO Media,Inc. is looking for an ambitious and fun team member who has exceptional knowledgeof Digital Marketing and a desire to expand their skills. Apply for thisposition if you are looking for an exciting start to a great career. Sendresume today with your qualifications for an appointment to interview on indeed.

DO NOT CALL OR EMAIL THE COMPANY, DOING SO WILL LEAD TO DISQUALIFICATION!

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Php281.00 - Php406.00 per hour

title: Web Operations Engineer
description:
We are on the hunt for a Web Operations Engineer acting as a systems integrator who is not only proficient in front-end and back-end development and HubSpot but also possesses extensive knowledge in SEO, with a strong emphasis on on-page, off-page, and keyword research strategies. This role is pivotal in integrating diverse systems and technologies while ensuring our digital presence is optimized for search engines.

**Responsibilities**

System Integration and Optimization:

* Develop and maintain robust integrations between HubSpot and other systems, with a focus on enhancing the e-commerce platform's functionality.
* Implement third-party plugins and APIs to extend the website's capabilities, ensuring high performance and availability.
* Collaborate with IT and development teams, communicating issues and blockers effectively and working on API-related tasks for website improvements.

Front-End Development and Maintenance:

* Design and refine front-end interfaces for the website and email campaigns, ensuring responsive design and optimal user experience.
* Maintain and optimize the company’s e-commerce platforms, focusing on front-end enhancements and updates.
* Perform DevOps tasks as needed, resolving customer issues in collaboration with customer support and engineering teams.

SEO Strategy and Performance:

* Lead and adapt the company’s SEO strategy to ensure maximum visibility on major search engines.
* Collaborate with content and marketing teams for optimized content creation, focusing on keyword targeting and on-page SEO.
* Stay updated with industry trends in SEO and e-commerce, developing plans to implement new solutions and architectures.

Cross-Functional and Collaborative Responsibilities:

* Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and advancements across all areas of responsibility.
* Perform tasks accurately, upholding the company's quality standards.
* Regularly attend team meetings to discuss projects, brainstorm ideas, and propose solutions to new challenges.
* Track customer issues to identify and implement long-term solutions for recurring problems.

Qualifications

* Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
* Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data and draw insights.
* 5+ years of experience in systems integration, front-end development, and SEO.
* Proficient with HubSpot CRM, Commerce, Marketing, Automation, and Data Ops.
* Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and communicate effectively.
* Self-motivated and able to prioritize tasks to meet deadlines.
* Knowledge of solutions available on the market that provide integrations for web application use in automated workflows such as Zapier.
* Proficient in Google Docs suite.
* Good knowledge of the marketing technology stack.
* You are a tech-savvy innovator with expertise in integrating systems and front-end development, skillfully blending your knowledge of HubSpot and advanced SEO strategies to enhance our digital footprint and show the world that we can effectively reduce our dependence on electricity.
* You are driven to work at companies that have a meaningful impact onstanching CO2e emissions.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Php50,000.00 - Php80,000.00 per month

Benefits:

* Additional leave
* Company Christmas gift
* Company events
* Health insurance
* Life insurance
* Opportunities for promotion

title: HR Intern (Talent Acquisition)
description:
Come and Join a growing and dynamic IT company located in both great cities in the Philippines - Makati & Cebu
  
  

**Office Location:** Cebu Business Park, Cebu City, Philippines
  
  

**Reporting to:** HR and Admin Supervisor and HR Manager - Talent Aquisition
  
  

Talent Acquisition Intern
  
  

The Talent Acquisition Intern is responsible for supporting the Talent Acquisition eam in managing the end-to-end recruitment process, from sourcing and screening candidates to onboarding new hires. The intern will also be assisting with various HR functions and administrative tasks to support the overall operations of the organization.
  
  

Job Responsibilities
  
  

Sourcing and screening potential candidates for various positions within the company,
  
  

Participating in interviews and selection processes to identify top talent,
  
  

Supports in preparing and organizing onboarding activities, including creating arrival tickets, managing pre-employment requirements, and coordinating the distribution and collection of onboarding documents such as job offers and job contracts,
  
  

Organizing and updating 201 files of Cebu employees,
  
  

Assisting new hires with the application process for government benefits assistance, such as SSS, PHIC, R1-A, ER2, 1902, etc,
  
  

Assist in conducting employment verification checks to ensure accuracy and compliance,
  
  

Maintaining and updating recruitment trackers and platforms to ensure accurate and up-to-date information,
  
  

Preparing and analyzing recruitment reports to identify trends and make data-driven decisions,
  
  

Reviewing job analyses and descriptions to ensure alignment with organizational needs,
  
  

Participating in meetings with universities for internship program partnerships,
  
  

Help with employee wellness and engagement initiatives,
  
  

Supporting day-to-day HR operations and performing administrative tasks, including biometrics registration and extraction, sourcing office and event suppliers, and participating in ID photoshoots.
  
  

Job Qualifications
  
  

Currently enrolled in a Human Resources, Business Administration, Psychology, or any related field,
  
  

Interest in talent acquisition or recruitment, with a willingness to learn and engage in interview processes,
  
  

Knowledge of other HR facets and willingness to assist in various HR functions,
  
  

Strong organizational and multitasking skills to manage multiple responsibilities effectively,
  
  

Effective communication and interpersonal skills,
  
  

Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality.
  
  

**Work set-up and working hours:**  

**Shifting schedule:** 10:00AM to 07:00PM
  
  

Onsite
  
  

Working at Datawords Philippines,
  
  

Learning opportunities
  
  

Team events
  
  

Virtual and Onsite Health and Wellness Programs
  
  

Onsite Gaming Areas/Lounges
  
  

Fun and Unique Datawords Culture!
  
  

WHO WE ARE
  
  

Datawords - International Digital Marketing Powered by Multicultural Technologies.
  
  

We see technology from a multicultural point of view, which is why our agency creates and proposes cutting edge solutions and innovations that scale quickly to any market.
  
  

We always aim to offer the best multicultural digital experience to our clients, and have acquired several agencies with specific expertise in recent years: Digiprod , an audio-visual production company, Vanksen , a digital strategy company and 87seconds , a creative video agency. In a world driven by disruption, we constantly challenge ourselves to improve our solutions and technology, such as Wezen . We focus both on organic growth and are always on the lookout for interesting acquisitions to complement our existing offering.
  
  

Datawords was born out of a vision of communication that transcends all borders to reach the broadest possible audience everywhere across the globe. At the heart of that vision is a mix of technological mastery and communications expertise that drives every aspect of our brand DNA — down to our very name.
  
  

Technology may be at the heart of what we do, but people are at the heart of who we are. They are the ones who make Datawords a singular place to work for – and with.
  
  

From every corner of the globe, our employees bring not only their local language and culture, but their individual energies, passions and motivations to the job each day. The result is a true melting pot of knowledge, skill and perspective in which solutions are never far away.
  
  

As technology advances faster and faster and the world becomes smaller every day, our team is made to change
  
  

and grow with the times. Because words and technology are only as meaningful as the people behind them.
  
  

Come and Join our Growing and Talented Team at Datawords Philippines!

title: Marketing Officer
description:
* Are you driven by a passion for marketing, eager to learn and innovate, and committed to delivering exceptional results that truly make a difference?
* Do you thrive in creatively tackling marketing challenges, adhering to essential guidelines while finding inventive solutions for broader initiatives?
* Are you looking to excel in a marketing position within an expanding organization that values flexibility, personal, professional, spiritual and financial development, and offers ample opportunities for growth?
* Do you want to have fun being part of a team where your life is greatly impacted for the better?


If so, you should consider the Aereach Strategic Partners Marketing Officer role.


At Aereach Strategic Partners, we are committed to excellence, meaningful relationships, and a vision of shaping futures through exceptional service. We are in search of a forward-thinking Marketing Officer who is not only eager to contribute to our sales and marketing efforts but is also skilled in utilizing AI and Machine Learning across various tasks and responsibilities to enhance our strategic direction and operational efficiency.

**WHO WE ARE:**


Aereach Strategic Partners stands at the forefront of transforming the remote staffing solutions landscape, fostering a culture of growth, diversity, and inclusivity. Our core values emphasize authentic relationships, integrity, innovation, and constant growth. We aim to empower our team members and offer impactful employment opportunities.

**ROLE SUMMARY:**


Reporting directly to the Strategic Partner to the President & CEO and Operations & Technology Lead, the Marketing Officer will play a critical role within our Sales and Marketing department. This position involves steering the execution of our marketing strategy, crafting and distributing marketing materials, managing our social media and digital marketing efforts, and utilizing AI and Machine Learning tools to analyze and report on the effectiveness of our marketing initiatives.

**KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:**

* Support the Strategic Partner to the President & CEO and Operations & Technology Lead in overseeing the Marketing Plan Strategy and Execution.
* Prepare content for the publication of marketing material and oversee distribution.
* Graphic Creation
* Website Creation and Maintenance
* Video Editing/Production
* eNewsletter Production
* Social Media & Digital Marketing Strategy and Execution
* Planning & Research to include Goal setting, Target audience research, Platform selection, Content planning and Budgeting.
* Content Creation & Management to include Content creation, Community management, Scheduling & posting and Collaborations & partnerships.
* Ensure Legal and compliance: Ensure social media activities comply with relevant laws and regulations.
* Crisis management: Address negative comments or online crises.
* Analysis & Reporting
* Track key metrics: Monitor engagement, reach, website traffic, leads generated, and other relevant metrics to measure the success of the marketing strategy.
* Reporting & analysis: Analyze data to understand what's working and what's not and identify areas for improvement. Report to Strategic Partner to the President & CEO and Operations & Technology Lead.
* Other tasks as required by the President & CEO, Strategic Partner to the President & CEO and Operations & Technology Lead.
* Communications/Team Meetings
* All Staff As Required
* Weekly L10 Meeting.
* Marketing/Leadership Team As Required
* Individual Training and Development

**WHAT WE OFFER:**

* A role at the heart of a vibrant and innovative team.
* An environment that champions creativity, strategic thinking, and the latest technological advancements.
* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Flexible working arrangements, including permanent work from home set-up.

**IDEAL CANDIDATE:**

* Proven experience in marketing, particularly with a strong background in digital marketing and social media management.
* Proficiency in utilizing AI and Machine Learning tools to drive marketing efforts and analyze data.
* Excellent communication, organizational, and strategic planning skills.
* A proactive problem-solver with a knack for innovation and creativity.
* Shares our core values and is committed to furthering our vision and mission.

**HOW TO APPLY:**


If you are the ideal match for Aereach and are skilled in leveraging AI and Machine Learning in marketing, please send your resume and portfolio to info@aereachpartners.com.


Join us and contribute to the success and growth of Aereach Strategic Partners with your expertise and innovative approach.

title: Product Specialist - Medical Related
description:
Product Specialists are responsible in the promotion and training of our products. Expands relationship with existing customers by supporting collaborative sales effort to increase growth on existing product lines.

(Basic [posted rate] + Allowance + Commission)

**Sales & Marketing**

1. Achieves product growth targets in assigned product line and districts  
2. Identifies and promotes new and existing product to target key accounts  
3. Responsible in for new account development in hospitals, clinics and laboratories.  
4. Conceptualize and lead product demand generating activities and promotions for assigned product line  
5. Conducts product demonstration and training to end-users  
6. Coordinates and relay information to the Technical Support team for system concerns of end-users.  
7. Communicates with principals, sales managers and sales personnel on customer concerns and issues.  
8. Plan, conceptualize and prepare promos for marketing of PCC diagnostics products and services.  
9. Cascades and monitor program implementation of principal guided targets and activities

**Administrative**

2. Updates monthly census of sales force data  
3. Attends and participates in conventions and seminars of end-users and principals

6. Participates in business reviews with principals and coordination meetings with Sales Team and other Department Heads

2. Conducts product training to analog and digital imaging system end-users  
3. Achieve assigned sales quota  
4. Maintain high customer satisfaction that meets Company standards  
5. Provides coaching and product development to sales representative to further enhance product knowledge and credibility

**Qualifications:**

1. Bachelor's in Medical Technology or Medical Laboratory Science  
2. At least 3 years of Medical Sales Experience is an advantage.  
3. Has experience in Product Presentations  
4. Must be well-versed with Microsoft Office Applications.  
5. Strong interpersonal and communication (both oral and written)  
6. Goal-driven, high energy self-starters with strong time management and planning skills  
7. Ability to work independently and must have the ability to persuade and influence others

title: Lead Generation Specialist (Work From Home)
description:
**Company Overview:**

Jewelry Store Marketers is a dynamic and innovative digital marketing company dedicated to helping businesses in Jewelry and other industries. With a focus on delivering exceptional results and driving growth for our clients, we offer a range of cutting-edge digital marketing services tailored to their unique needs. We are seeking a talented and motivated Lead Generation Specialist to join our team and play a key role in expanding our client base.

**Position Overview:**

As a Lead Generation Specialist at JSM, you will be responsible for identifying and generating high-quality leads for our digital marketing services. You will leverage your expertise in digital marketing strategies, market research, and lead generation tactics to drive qualified prospects to our client pipeline. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work with a dynamic team and make a significant impact on our company's growth trajectory.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Conduct thorough market research to identify potential clients and target industries for lead generation campaigns.
* Develop and implement lead generation strategies across various channels, including email marketing, social media, content marketing, and advertising.
* Create compelling lead magnets, landing pages, and other digital assets to attract and capture leads effectively.
* Utilize marketing automation tools and CRM systems to manage and nurture leads throughout the sales cycle.
* Collaborate closely with the different marketing teams to align lead generation efforts with business objectives and targets.
* Monitor and analyze key performance metrics to evaluate the effectiveness of lead generation campaigns and optimize strategies for maximum results.
* Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in lead generation and digital marketing.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
* Proven experience in lead generation, preferably within a digital marketing agency or related industry.
* In-depth knowledge of digital marketing strategies, tactics, and tools for lead generation.
* Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to drive informed decisions.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams.
